00082 /* ********************** view3d_edit: view manipulations ********************* */
00083 
00084 int ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d)
00085 {
00086     return ((v3d->camera) &&
00087             (v3d->camera->id.lib == NULL) &&
00088             (v3d->flag2 & V3D_LOCK_CAMERA) &&
00089             (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB));
00090 }
00091 
00092 void ED_view3d_camera_lock_init(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d)
00093 {
00094     if (ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
00095         ED_view3d_from_object(v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, &rv3d->dist, NULL);
00096     }
00097 }
00098 
00099 /* return TRUE if the camera is moved */
00100 int ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d)
00101 {
00102     if (ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
00103         ObjectTfmProtectedChannels obtfm;
00104         Object *root_parent;
00105 
00106         if ((U.uiflag & USER_CAM_LOCK_NO_PARENT) == 0 && (root_parent = v3d->camera->parent)) {
00107             Object *ob_update;
00108             float view_mat[4][4];
00109             float diff_mat[4][4];
00110             float parent_mat[4][4];
00111 
00112             while (root_parent->parent) {
00113                 root_parent = root_parent->parent;
00114             }
00115 
00116             ED_view3d_to_m4(view_mat, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->dist);
00117 
00118             invert_m4_m4(v3d->camera->imat, v3d->camera->obmat);
00119             mult_m4_m4m4(diff_mat, view_mat, v3d->camera->imat);
00120 
00121             mult_m4_m4m4(parent_mat, diff_mat, root_parent->obmat);
00122 
00123             object_tfm_protected_backup(root_parent, &obtfm);
00124             object_apply_mat4(root_parent, parent_mat, TRUE, FALSE);
00125             object_tfm_protected_restore(root_parent, &obtfm, root_parent->protectflag);
00126 
00127             ob_update = v3d->camera;
00128             while (ob_update) {
00129                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_update->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00130                 WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, ob_update);
00131                 ob_update = ob_update->parent;
00132             }
00133         }
00134         else {
00135             object_tfm_protected_backup(v3d->camera, &obtfm);
00136             ED_view3d_to_object(v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->dist);
00137             object_tfm_protected_restore(v3d->camera, &obtfm, v3d->camera->protectflag);
00138 
00139             DAG_id_tag_update(&v3d->camera->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00140             WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, v3d->camera);
00141         }
00142 
00143         return TRUE;
00144     }
00145     else {
00146         return FALSE;
00147     }
00148 }

00151 /* ********************* box view support ***************** */
00152 
00153 static void view3d_boxview_clip(ScrArea *sa)
00154 {
00155     ARegion *ar;
00156     BoundBox *bb = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoundBox), "clipbb");
00157     float clip[6][4];
00158     float x1 = 0.0f, y1 = 0.0f, z1 = 0.0f, ofs[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00159     int val;
00160 
00161     /* create bounding box */
00162     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00163         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00164             RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00165 
00166             if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXCLIP) {
00167                 if (ELEM(rv3d->view, RV3D_VIEW_TOP, RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM)) {
00168                     if (ar->winx > ar->winy) x1 = rv3d->dist;
00169                     else x1 = ar->winx * rv3d->dist / ar->winy;
00170 
00171                     if (ar->winx > ar->winy) y1 = ar->winy * rv3d->dist / ar->winx;
00172                     else y1 = rv3d->dist;
00173                     copy_v2_v2(ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00174                 }
00175                 else if (ELEM(rv3d->view, RV3D_VIEW_FRONT, RV3D_VIEW_BACK)) {
00176                     ofs[2] = rv3d->ofs[2];
00177 
00178                     if (ar->winx > ar->winy) z1 = ar->winy * rv3d->dist / ar->winx;
00179                     else z1 = rv3d->dist;
00180                 }
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185     for (val = 0; val < 8; val++) {
00186         if (ELEM4(val, 0, 3, 4, 7))
00187             bb->vec[val][0] = -x1 - ofs[0];
00188         else
00189             bb->vec[val][0] =  x1 - ofs[0];
00190 
00191         if (ELEM4(val, 0, 1, 4, 5))
00192             bb->vec[val][1] = -y1 - ofs[1];
00193         else
00194             bb->vec[val][1] =  y1 - ofs[1];
00195 
00196         if (val > 3)
00197             bb->vec[val][2] = -z1 - ofs[2];
00198         else
00199             bb->vec[val][2] =  z1 - ofs[2];
00200     }
00201 
00202     /* normals for plane equations */
00203     normal_tri_v3(clip[0], bb->vec[0], bb->vec[1], bb->vec[4]);
00204     normal_tri_v3(clip[1], bb->vec[1], bb->vec[2], bb->vec[5]);
00205     normal_tri_v3(clip[2], bb->vec[2], bb->vec[3], bb->vec[6]);
00206     normal_tri_v3(clip[3], bb->vec[3], bb->vec[0], bb->vec[7]);
00207     normal_tri_v3(clip[4], bb->vec[4], bb->vec[5], bb->vec[6]);
00208     normal_tri_v3(clip[5], bb->vec[0], bb->vec[2], bb->vec[1]);
00209 
00210     /* then plane equations */
00211     for (val = 0; val < 6; val++) {
00212         clip[val][3] = -dot_v3v3(clip[val], bb->vec[val % 5]);
00213     }
00214 
00215     /* create bounding box */
00216     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00217         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00218             RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00219 
00220             if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXCLIP) {
00221                 rv3d->rflag |= RV3D_CLIPPING;
00222                 memcpy(rv3d->clip, clip, sizeof(clip));
00223                 if (rv3d->clipbb) MEM_freeN(rv3d->clipbb);
00224                 rv3d->clipbb = MEM_dupallocN(bb);
00225             }
00226         }
00227     }
00228     MEM_freeN(bb);
00229 }
00230 
00231 /* sync center/zoom view of region to others, for view transforms */
00232 static void view3d_boxview_sync(ScrArea *sa, ARegion *ar)
00233 {
00234     ARegion *artest;
00235     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00236     short clip = 0;
00237 
00238     for (artest = sa->regionbase.first; artest; artest = artest->next) {
00239         if (artest != ar && artest->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00240             RegionView3D *rv3dtest = artest->regiondata;
00241 
00242             if (rv3dtest->viewlock) {
00243                 rv3dtest->dist = rv3d->dist;
00244 
00245                 if (ELEM(rv3d->view, RV3D_VIEW_TOP, RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM) ) {
00246                     if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_FRONT, RV3D_VIEW_BACK))
00247                         rv3dtest->ofs[0] = rv3d->ofs[0];
00248                     else if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT, RV3D_VIEW_LEFT))
00249                         rv3dtest->ofs[1] = rv3d->ofs[1];
00250                 }
00251                 else if (ELEM(rv3d->view, RV3D_VIEW_FRONT, RV3D_VIEW_BACK) ) {
00252                     if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_TOP, RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM))
00253                         rv3dtest->ofs[0] = rv3d->ofs[0];
00254                     else if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT, RV3D_VIEW_LEFT))
00255                         rv3dtest->ofs[2] = rv3d->ofs[2];
00256                 }
00257                 else if (ELEM(rv3d->view, RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT, RV3D_VIEW_LEFT) ) {
00258                     if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_TOP, RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM))
00259                         rv3dtest->ofs[1] = rv3d->ofs[1];
00260                     if (ELEM(rv3dtest->view, RV3D_VIEW_FRONT, RV3D_VIEW_BACK))
00261                         rv3dtest->ofs[2] = rv3d->ofs[2];
00262                 }
00263 
00264                 clip |= rv3dtest->viewlock & RV3D_BOXCLIP;
00265 
00266                 ED_region_tag_redraw(artest);
00267             }
00268         }
00269     }
00270 
00271     if (clip) {
00272         view3d_boxview_clip(sa);
00273     }
00274 }
00275 
00276 /* for home, center etc */
00277 void view3d_boxview_copy(ScrArea *sa, ARegion *ar)
00278 {
00279     ARegion *artest;
00280     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00281     short clip = 0;
00282 
00283     for (artest = sa->regionbase.first; artest; artest = artest->next) {
00284         if (artest != ar && artest->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00285             RegionView3D *rv3dtest = artest->regiondata;
00286 
00287             if (rv3dtest->viewlock) {
00288                 rv3dtest->dist = rv3d->dist;
00289                 copy_v3_v3(rv3dtest->ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00290                 ED_region_tag_redraw(artest);
00291 
00292                 clip |= rv3dtest->viewlock & RV3D_BOXCLIP;
00293             }
00294         }
00295     }
00296 
00297     if (clip) {
00298         view3d_boxview_clip(sa);
00299     }
00300 }
00301 
00302 /* 'clip' is used to know if our clip setting has changed */
00303 void ED_view3d_quadview_update(ScrArea *sa, ARegion *ar, short do_clip)
00304 {
00305     ARegion *ar_sync = NULL;
00306     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00307     short viewlock;
00308     /* this function copies flags from the first of the 3 other quadview
00309      * regions to the 2 other, so it assumes this is the region whose
00310      * properties are always being edited, weak */
00311     viewlock = rv3d->viewlock;
00312 
00313     if ((viewlock & RV3D_LOCKED) == 0)
00314         viewlock = 0;
00315     else if ((viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW) == 0) {
00316         viewlock &= ~RV3D_BOXCLIP;
00317         do_clip = TRUE;
00318     }
00319 
00320     for (; ar; ar = ar->prev) {
00321         if (ar->alignment == RGN_ALIGN_QSPLIT) {
00322             rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00323             rv3d->viewlock = viewlock;
00324 
00325             if (do_clip && (viewlock & RV3D_BOXCLIP) == 0) {
00326                 rv3d->rflag &= ~RV3D_BOXCLIP;
00327             }
00328 
00329             /* use ar_sync so we sync with one of the aligned views below
00330              * else the view jumps on changing view settings like 'clip'
00331              * since it copies from the perspective view */
00332             ar_sync = ar;
00333         }
00334     }
00335 
00336     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW) {
00337         view3d_boxview_copy(sa, ar_sync ? ar_sync : sa->regionbase.last);
00338     }
00339 
00340     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00341 }

00345 typedef struct ViewOpsData {
00346     ScrArea *sa;
00347     ARegion *ar;
00348     View3D *v3d;
00349     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00350 
00351     /* needed for continuous zoom */
00352     wmTimer *timer;
00353     double timer_lastdraw;
00354 
00355     float oldquat[4];
00356     float viewquat[4]; /* working copy of rv3d->viewquat */
00357     float trackvec[3];
00358     float mousevec[3]; /* dolly only */
00359     float reverse, dist0, camzoom0;
00360     float grid, far;
00361     short axis_snap; /* view rotate only */
00362 
00363     /* use for orbit selection and auto-dist */
00364     float ofs[3], dyn_ofs[3];
00365     short use_dyn_ofs;
00366 
00367     int origx, origy, oldx, oldy;
00368     int origkey; /* the key that triggered the operator */
00369 
00370 } ViewOpsData;
00371 
00372 #define TRACKBALLSIZE  (1.1)
00373 
00374 static void calctrackballvec(rcti *rect, int mx, int my, float vec[3])
00375 {
00376     float x, y, radius, d, z, t;
00377 
00378     radius = TRACKBALLSIZE;
00379 
00380     /* normalize x and y */
00381     x = (rect->xmax + rect->xmin) / 2 - mx;
00382     x /= (float)((rect->xmax - rect->xmin) / 4);
00383     y = (rect->ymax + rect->ymin) / 2 - my;
00384     y /= (float)((rect->ymax - rect->ymin) / 2);
00385 
00386     d = sqrt(x * x + y * y);
00387     if (d < radius * (float)M_SQRT1_2) { /* Inside sphere */
00388         z = sqrt(radius * radius - d * d);
00389     }
00390     else { /* On hyperbola */
00391         t = radius / (float)M_SQRT2;
00392         z = t * t / d;
00393     }
00394 
00395     vec[0] = x;
00396     vec[1] = y;
00397     vec[2] = -z;     /* yah yah! */
00398 }
00399 
00400 
00401 static void viewops_data_create(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00402 {
00403     static float lastofs[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00404     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00405     ViewOpsData *vod = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ViewOpsData), "viewops data");
00406 
00407     /* store data */
00408     op->customdata = vod;
00409     vod->sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00410     vod->ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00411     vod->v3d = vod->sa->spacedata.first;
00412     vod->rv3d = rv3d = vod->ar->regiondata;
00413 
00414     /* set the view from the camera, if view locking is enabled.
00415      * we may want to make this optional but for now its needed always */
00416     ED_view3d_camera_lock_init(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d);
00417 
00418     vod->dist0 = rv3d->dist;
00419     vod->camzoom0 = rv3d->camzoom;
00420     copy_qt_qt(vod->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat);
00421     copy_qt_qt(vod->oldquat, rv3d->viewquat);
00422     vod->origx = vod->oldx = event->x;
00423     vod->origy = vod->oldy = event->y;
00424     vod->origkey = event->type; /* the key that triggered the operator.  */
00425     vod->use_dyn_ofs = (U.uiflag & USER_ORBIT_SELECTION) ? 1 : 0;
00426     copy_v3_v3(vod->ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00427 
00428     if (vod->use_dyn_ofs) {
00429         /* If there's no selection, lastofs is unmodified and last value since static */
00430         calculateTransformCenter(C, V3D_CENTROID, lastofs);
00431         negate_v3_v3(vod->dyn_ofs, lastofs);
00432     }
00433     else if (U.uiflag & USER_ORBIT_ZBUF) {
00434 
00435         view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C); /* needed for zbuf drawing */
00436 
00437         if ((vod->use_dyn_ofs = ED_view3d_autodist(CTX_data_scene(C), vod->ar, vod->v3d, event->mval, vod->dyn_ofs))) {
00438             if (rv3d->is_persp) {
00439                 float my_origin[3]; /* original G.vd->ofs */
00440                 float my_pivot[3]; /* view */
00441                 float dvec[3];
00442 
00443                 // locals for dist correction
00444                 float mat[3][3];
00445                 float upvec[3];
00446 
00447                 negate_v3_v3(my_origin, rv3d->ofs);             /* ofs is flipped */
00448 
00449                 /* Set the dist value to be the distance from this 3d point
00450                  * this means youll always be able to zoom into it and panning wont go bad when dist was zero */
00451 
00452                 /* remove dist value */
00453                 upvec[0] = upvec[1] = 0;
00454                 upvec[2] = rv3d->dist;
00455                 copy_m3_m4(mat, rv3d->viewinv);
00456 
00457                 mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00458                 sub_v3_v3v3(my_pivot, rv3d->ofs, upvec);
00459                 negate_v3(my_pivot);                /* ofs is flipped */
00460 
00461                 /* find a new ofs value that is along the view axis (rather than the mouse location) */
00462                 closest_to_line_v3(dvec, vod->dyn_ofs, my_pivot, my_origin);
00463                 vod->dist0 = rv3d->dist = len_v3v3(my_pivot, dvec);
00464 
00465                 negate_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, dvec);
00466             }
00467             negate_v3(vod->dyn_ofs);
00468             copy_v3_v3(vod->ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00469         }
00470     }
00471 
00472     {
00473         /* for dolly */
00474         float mval_f[2];
00475         VECCOPY2D(mval_f, event->mval);
00476         ED_view3d_win_to_vector(vod->ar, mval_f, vod->mousevec);
00477     }
00478 
00479     /* lookup, we don't pass on v3d to prevent confusement */
00480     vod->grid = vod->v3d->grid;
00481     vod->far = vod->v3d->far;
00482 
00483     calctrackballvec(&vod->ar->winrct, event->x, event->y, vod->trackvec);
00484 
00485     initgrabz(rv3d, -rv3d->ofs[0], -rv3d->ofs[1], -rv3d->ofs[2]);
00486 
00487     vod->reverse = 1.0f;
00488     if (rv3d->persmat[2][1] < 0.0f)
00489         vod->reverse = -1.0f;
00490 
00491     rv3d->rflag |= RV3D_NAVIGATING;
00492 }
00493 
00494 static void viewops_data_free(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00495 {
00496     ARegion *ar;
00497     Paint *p = paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C));
00498 
00499     if (op->customdata) {
00500         ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
00501         ar = vod->ar;
00502         vod->rv3d->rflag &= ~RV3D_NAVIGATING;
00503 
00504         if (vod->timer)
00505             WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), vod->timer->win, vod->timer);
00506 
00507         MEM_freeN(vod);
00508         op->customdata = NULL;
00509     }
00510     else {
00511         ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00512     }
00513 
00514     if (p && (p->flags & PAINT_FAST_NAVIGATE))
00515         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00516 }
00517 
00518 /* ************************** viewrotate **********************************/
00519 
00520 #define COS45 0.7071068
00521 #define SIN45 COS45
00522 
00523 #define NUM_SNAP_QUATS 39
00524 
00525 static const float snapquats[NUM_SNAP_QUATS][5] = {
00526     /*{q0, q1, q3, q4, view}*/
00527     {COS45, -SIN45, 0.0,    0.0,   RV3D_VIEW_FRONT},
00528     {0.0,    0.0,  -SIN45, -SIN45, RV3D_VIEW_BACK},
00529     {1.0,    0.0,   0.0,    0.0,   RV3D_VIEW_TOP},
00530     {0.0,   -1.0,   0.0,    0.0,   RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM},
00531     {0.5,   -0.5,  -0.5,   -0.5,   RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT},
00532     {0.5,   -0.5,   0.5,    0.5,   RV3D_VIEW_LEFT},
00533 
00534     /* some more 45 deg snaps */
00535     { 0.6532815, -0.6532815, 0.2705981, 0.2705981, 0},
00536     { 0.9238795,  0.0,       0.0,       0.3826834, 0},
00537     { 0.0,       -0.9238795, 0.3826834, 0.0,       0},
00538     { 0.3535534, -0.8535534, 0.3535534, 0.1464466, 0},
00539     { 0.8535534, -0.3535534, 0.1464466, 0.3535534, 0},
00540     { 0.4999999, -0.4999999, 0.5,       0.5,       0},
00541     { 0.2705980, -0.6532815, 0.6532815, 0.2705980, 0},
00542     { 0.6532815, -0.2705980, 0.2705980, 0.6532815, 0},
00543     { 0.2705978, -0.2705980, 0.6532814, 0.6532814, 0},
00544     { 0.3826834,  0.0,       0.0,       0.9238794, 0},
00545     { 0.0,       -0.3826834, 0.9238794, 0.0,       0},
00546     { 0.1464466, -0.3535534, 0.8535534, 0.3535534, 0},
00547     { 0.3535534, -0.1464466, 0.3535534, 0.8535534, 0},
00548     { 0.0,        0.0,       0.9238794, 0.3826834, 0},
00549     {-0.0,        0.0,       0.3826834, 0.9238794, 0},
00550     {-0.2705980,  0.2705980, 0.6532813, 0.6532813, 0},
00551     {-0.3826834,  0.0,       0.0,       0.9238794, 0},
00552     { 0.0,        0.3826834, 0.9238794, 0.0,       0},
00553     {-0.1464466,  0.3535534, 0.8535533, 0.3535533, 0},
00554     {-0.3535534,  0.1464466, 0.3535533, 0.8535533, 0},
00555     {-0.4999999,  0.4999999, 0.4999999, 0.4999999, 0},
00556     {-0.2705980,  0.6532815, 0.6532814, 0.2705980, 0},
00557     {-0.6532815,  0.2705980, 0.2705980, 0.6532814, 0},
00558     {-0.6532813,  0.6532813, 0.2705979, 0.2705979, 0},
00559     {-0.9238793,  0.0,       0.0,       0.3826833, 0},
00560     { 0.0,        0.9238793, 0.3826833, 0.0,       0},
00561     {-0.3535533,  0.8535533, 0.3535533, 0.1464466, 0},
00562     {-0.8535533,  0.3535533, 0.1464466, 0.3535533, 0},
00563     {-0.3826833,  0.9238794, 0.0,       0.0,       0},
00564     {-0.9238794,  0.3826833, 0.0,       0.0,       0},
00565     {-COS45,      0.0,       0.0,       SIN45,     0},
00566     { COS45,      0.0,       0.0,       SIN45,     0},
00567     { 0.0,        0.0,       0.0,       1.0,       0}
00568 };
00569 
00570 enum {
00571     VIEW_PASS = 0,
00572     VIEW_APPLY,
00573     VIEW_CONFIRM
00574 };
00575 
00576 /* NOTE: these defines are saved in keymap files, do not change values but just add new ones */
00577 #define VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM              1 /* used for all view operations */
00578 #define VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_ENABLE  2
00579 #define VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_DISABLE 3
00580 #define VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM       4
00581 #define VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE       5
00582 #define VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE     6
00583 
00584 /* called in transform_ops.c, on each regeneration of keymaps  */
00585 void viewrotate_modal_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00586 {
00587     static EnumPropertyItem modal_items[] = {
00588         {VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM,    "CONFIRM", 0, "Confirm", ""},
00589 
00590         {VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_ENABLE,    "AXIS_SNAP_ENABLE", 0, "Enable Axis Snap", ""},
00591         {VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_DISABLE,   "AXIS_SNAP_DISABLE", 0, "Disable Axis Snap", ""},
00592         
00593         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM, "SWITCH_TO_ZOOM", 0, "Switch to Zoom"},
00594         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE, "SWITCH_TO_MOVE", 0, "Switch to Move"},
00595 
00596         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00597     };
00598 
00599     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_modalkeymap_get(keyconf, "View3D Rotate Modal");
00600 
00601     /* this function is called for each spacetype, only needs to add map once */
00602     if (keymap && keymap->modal_items) return;
00603 
00604     keymap = WM_modalkeymap_add(keyconf, "View3D Rotate Modal", modal_items);
00605 
00606     /* items for modal map */
00607     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00608     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ESCKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00609 
00610     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTALTKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_ENABLE);
00611     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTALTKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_DISABLE);
00612 
00613     /* disabled mode switching for now, can re-implement better, later on */
00614 #if 0
00615     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM);
00616     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM);
00617     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTSHIFTKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE);
00618 #endif
00619     
00620     /* assign map to operators */
00621     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "VIEW3D_OT_rotate");
00622 
00623 }
00624 
00625 static void viewrotate_apply(ViewOpsData *vod, int x, int y)
00626 {
00627     RegionView3D *rv3d = vod->rv3d;
00628 
00629     rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER; /* need to reset everytime because of view snapping */
00630 
00631     if (U.flag & USER_TRACKBALL) {
00632         float phi, si, q1[4], dvec[3], newvec[3];
00633 
00634         calctrackballvec(&vod->ar->winrct, x, y, newvec);
00635 
00636         sub_v3_v3v3(dvec, newvec, vod->trackvec);
00637 
00638         si = len_v3(dvec);
00639         si /= (float)(2.0 * TRACKBALLSIZE);
00640 
00641         cross_v3_v3v3(q1 + 1, vod->trackvec, newvec);
00642         normalize_v3(q1 + 1);
00643 
00644         /* Allow for rotation beyond the interval [-pi, pi] */
00645         while (si > 1.0f)
00646             si -= 2.0f;
00647 
00648         /* This relation is used instead of
00649          * - phi = asin(si) so that the angle
00650          * - of rotation is linearly proportional
00651          * - to the distance that the mouse is
00652          * - dragged. */
00653         phi = si * (float)(M_PI / 2.0);
00654 
00655         q1[0] = cos(phi);
00656         mul_v3_fl(q1 + 1, sin(phi));
00657         mul_qt_qtqt(vod->viewquat, q1, vod->oldquat);
00658 
00659         if (vod->use_dyn_ofs) {
00660             /* compute the post multiplication quat, to rotate the offset correctly */
00661             copy_qt_qt(q1, vod->oldquat);
00662             conjugate_qt(q1);
00663             mul_qt_qtqt(q1, q1, vod->viewquat);
00664 
00665             conjugate_qt(q1); /* conj == inv for unit quat */
00666             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->ofs);
00667             sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00668             mul_qt_v3(q1, rv3d->ofs);
00669             add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00670         }
00671     }
00672     else {
00673         /* New turntable view code by John Aughey */
00674         float q1[4];
00675         float m[3][3];
00676         float m_inv[3][3];
00677         const float zvec_global[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f};
00678         float xaxis[3];
00679 
00680         /* Sensitivity will control how fast the viewport rotates.  0.007 was
00681          * obtained experimentally by looking at viewport rotation sensitivities
00682          * on other modeling programs. */
00683         /* Perhaps this should be a configurable user parameter. */
00684         const float sensitivity = 0.007f;
00685 
00686         /* Get the 3x3 matrix and its inverse from the quaternion */
00687         quat_to_mat3(m, vod->viewquat);
00688         invert_m3_m3(m_inv, m);
00689 
00690         /* avoid gimble lock */
00691 #if 1
00692         if (len_squared_v3v3(zvec_global, m_inv[2]) > 0.001f) {
00693             float fac;
00694             cross_v3_v3v3(xaxis, zvec_global, m_inv[2]);
00695             if (dot_v3v3(xaxis, m_inv[0]) < 0) {
00696                 negate_v3(xaxis);
00697             }
00698             fac = angle_normalized_v3v3(zvec_global, m_inv[2]) / M_PI;
00699             fac = fabsf(fac - 0.5f) * 2;
00700             fac = fac * fac;
00701             interp_v3_v3v3(xaxis, xaxis, m_inv[0], fac);
00702         }
00703         else
00704 #endif
00705         {
00706             copy_v3_v3(xaxis, m_inv[0]);
00707         }
00708 
00709         /* Determine the direction of the x vector (for rotating up and down) */
00710         /* This can likely be computed directly from the quaternion. */
00711 
00712         /* Perform the up/down rotation */
00713         axis_angle_to_quat(q1, xaxis, sensitivity * -(y - vod->oldy));
00714         mul_qt_qtqt(vod->viewquat, vod->viewquat, q1);
00715 
00716         if (vod->use_dyn_ofs) {
00717             conjugate_qt(q1); /* conj == inv for unit quat */
00718             sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00719             mul_qt_v3(q1, rv3d->ofs);
00720             add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00721         }
00722 
00723         /* Perform the orbital rotation */
00724         axis_angle_to_quat(q1, zvec_global, sensitivity * vod->reverse * (x - vod->oldx));
00725         mul_qt_qtqt(vod->viewquat, vod->viewquat, q1);
00726 
00727         if (vod->use_dyn_ofs) {
00728             conjugate_qt(q1);
00729             sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00730             mul_qt_v3(q1, rv3d->ofs);
00731             add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vod->dyn_ofs);
00732         }
00733     }
00734 
00735     /* check for view snap */
00736     if (vod->axis_snap) {
00737         int i;
00738         float viewquat_inv[4];
00739         float zaxis[3] = {0, 0, 1};
00740         invert_qt_qt(viewquat_inv, vod->viewquat);
00741 
00742         mul_qt_v3(viewquat_inv, zaxis);
00743 
00744         for (i = 0; i < NUM_SNAP_QUATS; i++) {
00745 
00746             float view = (int)snapquats[i][4];
00747             float viewquat_inv_test[4];
00748             float zaxis_test[3] = {0, 0, 1};
00749 
00750             invert_qt_qt(viewquat_inv_test, snapquats[i]);
00751             mul_qt_v3(viewquat_inv_test, zaxis_test);
00752             
00753             if (angle_v3v3(zaxis_test, zaxis) < DEG2RADF(45 / 3)) {
00754                 /* find the best roll */
00755                 float quat_roll[4], quat_final[4], quat_best[4];
00756                 float viewquat_align[4]; /* viewquat aligned to zaxis_test */
00757                 float viewquat_align_inv[4]; /* viewquat aligned to zaxis_test */
00758                 float best_angle = FLT_MAX;
00759                 int j;
00760 
00761                 /* viewquat_align is the original viewquat aligned to the snapped axis
00762                  * for testing roll */
00763                 rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(viewquat_align, zaxis_test, zaxis);
00764                 normalize_qt(viewquat_align);
00765                 mul_qt_qtqt(viewquat_align, vod->viewquat, viewquat_align);
00766                 normalize_qt(viewquat_align);
00767                 invert_qt_qt(viewquat_align_inv, viewquat_align);
00768 
00769                 /* find best roll */
00770                 for (j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00771                     float angle;
00772                     float xaxis1[3] = {1, 0, 0};
00773                     float xaxis2[3] = {1, 0, 0};
00774                     float quat_final_inv[4];
00775 
00776                     axis_angle_to_quat(quat_roll, zaxis_test, (float)j * DEG2RADF(45.0f));
00777                     normalize_qt(quat_roll);
00778 
00779                     mul_qt_qtqt(quat_final, snapquats[i], quat_roll);
00780                     normalize_qt(quat_final);
00781                     
00782                     /* compare 2 vector angles to find the least roll */
00783                     invert_qt_qt(quat_final_inv, quat_final);
00784                     mul_qt_v3(viewquat_align_inv, xaxis1);
00785                     mul_qt_v3(quat_final_inv, xaxis2);
00786                     angle = angle_v3v3(xaxis1, xaxis2);
00787 
00788                     if (angle <= best_angle) {
00789                         best_angle = angle;
00790                         copy_qt_qt(quat_best, quat_final);
00791                         if (j) view = 0;  /* view grid assumes certain up axis */
00792                     }
00793                 }
00794 
00795                 copy_qt_qt(vod->viewquat, quat_best);
00796                 rv3d->view = view; /* if we snap to a rolled camera the grid is invalid */
00797 
00798                 break;
00799             }
00800         }
00801     }
00802     vod->oldx = x;
00803     vod->oldy = y;
00804 
00805     /* avoid precision loss over time */
00806     normalize_qt(vod->viewquat);
00807 
00808     /* use a working copy so view rotation locking doesnt overwrite the locked
00809      * rotation back into the view we calculate with */
00810     copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, vod->viewquat);
00811 
00812     ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(vod->v3d, rv3d);
00813 
00814     ED_region_tag_redraw(vod->ar);
00815 }
00816 
00817 static int viewrotate_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00818 {
00819     ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
00820     short event_code = VIEW_PASS;
00821 
00822     /* execute the events */
00823     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
00824         event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
00825     }
00826     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
00827         switch (event->val) {
00828             case VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM:
00829                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
00830                 break;
00831             case VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_ENABLE:
00832                 vod->axis_snap = TRUE;
00833                 event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
00834                 break;
00835             case VIEWROT_MODAL_AXIS_SNAP_DISABLE:
00836                 vod->axis_snap = FALSE;
00837                 event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
00838                 break;
00839             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM:
00840                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_zoom", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
00841                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
00842                 break;
00843             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE:
00844                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_move", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
00845                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
00846                 break;
00847         }
00848     }
00849     else if (event->type == vod->origkey && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00850         event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
00851     }
00852 
00853     if (event_code == VIEW_APPLY) {
00854         viewrotate_apply(vod, event->x, event->y);
00855     }
00856     else if (event_code == VIEW_CONFIRM) {
00857         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
00858         viewops_data_free(C, op);
00859 
00860         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00861     }
00862 
00863     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00864 }
00865 
00866 static int viewrotate_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00867 {
00868     ViewOpsData *vod;
00869     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00870 
00871     /* makes op->customdata */
00872     viewops_data_create(C, op, event);
00873     vod = op->customdata;
00874     rv3d = vod->rv3d;
00875 
00876     if (rv3d->viewlock) { /* poll should check but in some cases fails, see poll func for details */
00877         viewops_data_free(C, op);
00878         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00879     }
00880 
00881     /* switch from camera view when: */
00882     if (rv3d->persp != RV3D_PERSP) {
00883 
00884         if (U.uiflag & USER_AUTOPERSP) {
00885             if (!ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d)) {
00886                 rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
00887             }
00888         }
00889         else if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
00890 
00891             /* changed since 2.4x, use the camera view */
00892             if (vod->v3d->camera) {
00893                 ED_view3d_from_object(vod->v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, &rv3d->dist, NULL);
00894             }
00895 
00896             if (!ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d)) {
00897                 rv3d->persp = rv3d->lpersp;
00898             }
00899         }
00900         ED_region_tag_redraw(vod->ar);
00901     }
00902     
00903     if (event->type == MOUSEPAN) {
00904         viewrotate_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy);
00905         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(rv3d);
00906         
00907         viewops_data_free(C, op);
00908         
00909         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00910     }
00911     else if (event->type == MOUSEROTATE) {
00912         /* MOUSEROTATE performs orbital rotation, so y axis delta is set to 0 */
00913         viewrotate_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->y);
00914         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(rv3d);
00915         
00916         viewops_data_free(C, op);
00917         
00918         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00919     }
00920     else {      
00921         /* add temp handler */
00922         WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00923 
00924         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00925     }
00926 }
00927 
00928 static int view3d_camera_active_poll(bContext *C)
00929 {
00930     if (ED_operator_view3d_active(C)) {
00931         RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00932         if (rv3d && rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
00933             return 1;
00934         }
00935     }
00936 
00937     return 0;
00938 }
00939 
00940 /* test for unlocked camera view in quad view */
00941 static int view3d_camera_user_poll(bContext *C)
00942 {
00943     View3D *v3d;
00944     ARegion *ar;
00945 
00946     if (ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar)) {
00947         RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00948         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
00949             return 1;
00950         }
00951     }
00952 
00953     return 0;
00954 }
00955 
00956 static int viewrotate_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00957 {
00958     viewops_data_free(C, op);
00959 
00960     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00961 }
00962 
00963 void VIEW3D_OT_rotate(wmOperatorType *ot)
00964 {
00965 
00966     /* identifiers */
00967     ot->name = "Rotate view";
00968     ot->description = "Rotate the view";
00969     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_rotate";
00970 
00971     /* api callbacks */
00972     ot->invoke = viewrotate_invoke;
00973     ot->modal = viewrotate_modal;
00974     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
00975     ot->cancel = viewrotate_cancel;
00976 
00977     /* flags */
00978     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING | OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
00979 }
00980 
00981 /* NDOF utility functions
00982  * (should these functions live in this file?)
00983  */
00984 float ndof_to_axis_angle(struct wmNDOFMotionData*ndof, float axis[3])
00985 {
00986     return ndof->dt * normalize_v3_v3(axis, ndof->rvec);
00987 }
00988 
00989 void ndof_to_quat(struct wmNDOFMotionData*ndof, float q[4])
00990 {
00991     float axis[3];
00992     float angle;
00993 
00994     angle = ndof_to_axis_angle(ndof, axis);
00995     axis_angle_to_quat(q, axis, angle);
00996 }
00997 
00998 /* -- "orbit" navigation (trackball/turntable)
00999  * -- zooming
01000  * -- panning in rotationally-locked views
01001  */
01002 static int ndof_orbit_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
01003 {
01004     if (event->type != NDOF_MOTION)
01005         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01006     else {
01007         View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01008         RegionView3D*rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
01009         wmNDOFMotionData*ndof = (wmNDOFMotionData *) event->customdata;
01010 
01011         ED_view3d_camera_lock_init(v3d, rv3d);
01012 
01013         rv3d->rot_angle = 0.f; /* off by default, until changed later this function */
01014 
01015         if (ndof->progress != P_FINISHING) {
01016             const float dt = ndof->dt;
01017 
01018             /* tune these until everything feels right */
01019             const float rot_sensitivity = 1.f;
01020             const float zoom_sensitivity = 1.f;
01021             const float pan_sensitivity = 1.f;
01022 
01023             const int has_rotation = rv3d->viewlock != RV3D_LOCKED && !is_zero_v3(ndof->rvec);
01024 
01025             float view_inv[4];
01026             invert_qt_qt(view_inv, rv3d->viewquat);
01027 
01028             /* #define DEBUG_NDOF_MOTION */
01029             #ifdef DEBUG_NDOF_MOTION
01030             printf("ndof: T=(%.2f,%.2f,%.2f) R=(%.2f,%.2f,%.2f) dt=%.3f delivered to 3D view\n",
01031                    ndof->tx, ndof->ty, ndof->tz, ndof->rx, ndof->ry, ndof->rz, ndof->dt);
01032             #endif
01033 
01034             if (ndof->tz) {
01035                 /* Zoom!
01036                  * velocity should be proportional to the linear velocity attained by rotational motion of same strength
01037                  * [got that?]
01038                  * proportional to arclength = radius * angle
01039                  */
01040                 float zoom_distance = zoom_sensitivity * rv3d->dist * dt * ndof->tz;
01041 
01042                 if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_ZOOM_INVERT)
01043                     zoom_distance = -zoom_distance;
01044 
01045                 rv3d->dist += zoom_distance;
01046             }
01047 
01048             if (rv3d->viewlock == RV3D_LOCKED) {
01049                 /* rotation not allowed -- explore panning options instead */
01050                 float pan_vec[3] = {ndof->tx, ndof->ty, 0.0f};
01051                 mul_v3_fl(pan_vec, pan_sensitivity * rv3d->dist * dt);
01052 
01053                 /* transform motion from view to world coordinates */
01054                 invert_qt_qt(view_inv, rv3d->viewquat);
01055                 mul_qt_v3(view_inv, pan_vec);
01056 
01057                 /* move center of view opposite of hand motion (this is camera mode, not object mode) */
01058                 sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, pan_vec);
01059             }
01060 
01061             if (has_rotation) {
01062 
01063                 rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
01064 
01065                 if (U.flag & USER_TRACKBALL) {
01066                     float rot[4];
01067                     float axis[3];
01068                     float angle = rot_sensitivity * ndof_to_axis_angle(ndof, axis);
01069 
01070                     if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_ROLL_INVERT_AXIS)
01071                         axis[2] = -axis[2];
01072 
01073                     if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_TILT_INVERT_AXIS)
01074                         axis[0] = -axis[0];
01075 
01076                     if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_ROTATE_INVERT_AXIS)
01077                         axis[1] = -axis[1];
01078 
01079                     /* transform rotation axis from view to world coordinates */
01080                     mul_qt_v3(view_inv, axis);
01081 
01082                     /* update the onscreen doo-dad */
01083                     rv3d->rot_angle = angle;
01084                     copy_v3_v3(rv3d->rot_axis, axis);
01085 
01086                     axis_angle_to_quat(rot, axis, angle);
01087 
01088                     /* apply rotation */
01089                     mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, rot);
01090 
01091                 }
01092                 else {
01093 
01094                     /* turntable view code by John Aughey, adapted for 3D mouse by [mce] */
01095                     float angle, rot[4];
01096                     float xvec[3] = {1, 0, 0};
01097 
01098                     /* Determine the direction of the x vector (for rotating up and down) */
01099                     mul_qt_v3(view_inv, xvec);
01100 
01101                     /* Perform the up/down rotation */
01102                     angle = rot_sensitivity * dt * ndof->rx;
01103                     if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_TILT_INVERT_AXIS)
01104                         angle = -angle;
01105                     rot[0] = cos(angle);
01106                     mul_v3_v3fl(rot + 1, xvec, sin(angle));
01107                     mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, rot);
01108 
01109                     /* Perform the orbital rotation */
01110                     angle = rot_sensitivity * dt * ndof->ry;
01111                     if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_ROTATE_INVERT_AXIS)
01112                         angle = -angle;
01113 
01114                     /* update the onscreen doo-dad */
01115                     rv3d->rot_angle = angle;
01116                     rv3d->rot_axis[0] = 0;
01117                     rv3d->rot_axis[1] = 0;
01118                     rv3d->rot_axis[2] = 1;
01119 
01120                     rot[0] = cos(angle);
01121                     rot[1] = rot[2] = 0.0;
01122                     rot[3] = sin(angle);
01123                     mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, rot);
01124                 }
01125             }
01126         }
01127 
01128         ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(v3d, rv3d);
01129 
01130         ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
01131 
01132         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01133     }
01134 }
01135 
01136 void VIEW3D_OT_ndof_orbit(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
01137 {
01138     /* identifiers */
01139     ot->name = "NDOF Orbit View";
01140     ot->description = "Explore every angle of an object using the 3D mouse";
01141     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_ndof_orbit";
01142 
01143     /* api callbacks */
01144     ot->invoke = ndof_orbit_invoke;
01145     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
01146 
01147     /* flags */
01148     ot->flag = 0;
01149 }
01150 
01151 /* -- "pan" navigation
01152  * -- zoom or dolly?
01153  */
01154 static int ndof_pan_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
01155 {
01156     if (event->type != NDOF_MOTION)
01157         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01158     else {
01159         View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01160         RegionView3D*rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
01161         wmNDOFMotionData*ndof = (wmNDOFMotionData *) event->customdata;
01162 
01163         ED_view3d_camera_lock_init(v3d, rv3d);
01164 
01165         rv3d->rot_angle = 0.f; /* we're panning here! so erase any leftover rotation from other operators */
01166 
01167         if (ndof->progress != P_FINISHING) {
01168             const float dt = ndof->dt;
01169             float view_inv[4];
01170 #if 0 /* ------------------------------------------- zoom with Z */
01171             /* tune these until everything feels right */
01172             const float zoom_sensitivity = 1.f;
01173             const float pan_sensitivity = 1.f;
01174 
01175             float pan_vec[3] = {
01176                 ndof->tx, ndof->ty, 0
01177             };
01178 
01179             /* "zoom in" or "translate"? depends on zoom mode in user settings? */
01180             if (ndof->tz) {
01181                 float zoom_distance = zoom_sensitivity * rv3d->dist * dt * ndof->tz;
01182                 rv3d->dist += zoom_distance;
01183             }
01184 
01185             mul_v3_fl(pan_vec, pan_sensitivity * rv3d->dist * dt);
01186 #else /* ------------------------------------------------------- dolly with Z */
01187             float speed = 10.f; /* blender units per second */
01188             /* ^^ this is ok for default cube scene, but should scale with.. something */
01189 
01190             /* tune these until everything feels right */
01191             const float forward_sensitivity = 1.f;
01192             const float vertical_sensitivity = 0.4f;
01193             const float lateral_sensitivity = 0.6f;
01194 
01195             float pan_vec[3];
01196 
01197             if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_PANX_INVERT_AXIS)
01198                 pan_vec[0] = -lateral_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[0];
01199             else
01200                 pan_vec[0] = lateral_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[0];
01201 
01202             if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_PANZ_INVERT_AXIS)
01203                 pan_vec[1] = -vertical_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[1];
01204             else
01205                 pan_vec[1] = vertical_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[1];
01206 
01207             if (U.ndof_flag & NDOF_PANY_INVERT_AXIS)
01208                 pan_vec[2] = -forward_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[2];
01209             else
01210                 pan_vec[2] = forward_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[2];
01211 
01212             mul_v3_fl(pan_vec, speed * dt);
01213 #endif
01214             /* transform motion from view to world coordinates */
01215             invert_qt_qt(view_inv, rv3d->viewquat);
01216             mul_qt_v3(view_inv, pan_vec);
01217 
01218             /* move center of view opposite of hand motion (this is camera mode, not object mode) */
01219             sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, pan_vec);
01220         }
01221 
01222         ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(v3d, rv3d);
01223 
01224         ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
01225 
01226         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01227     }
01228 }
01229

01232     /* identifiers */

01235     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_ndof_pan";
01236 
01237     /* api callbacks */

01240 
01241     /* flags */
01242     ot->flag = 0;
01243 }

01245 /* ************************ viewmove ******************************** */
01246 
01247 
01248 /* NOTE: these defines are saved in keymap files, do not change values but just add new ones */
01249 
01250 /* called in transform_ops.c, on each regeneration of keymaps  */
01251 void viewmove_modal_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
01252 {
01253     static EnumPropertyItem modal_items[] = {
01254         {VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM,    "CONFIRM", 0, "Confirm", ""},
01255         
01256         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM, "SWITCH_TO_ZOOM", 0, "Switch to Zoom"},
01257         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE, "SWITCH_TO_ROTATE", 0, "Switch to Rotate"},
01258 
01259         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01260     };
01261 
01262     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_modalkeymap_get(keyconf, "View3D Move Modal");
01263 
01264     /* this function is called for each spacetype, only needs to add map once */
01265     if (keymap && keymap->modal_items) return;
01266 
01267     keymap = WM_modalkeymap_add(keyconf, "View3D Move Modal", modal_items);
01268 
01269     /* items for modal map */
01270     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
01271     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ESCKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
01272 
01273     /* disabled mode switching for now, can re-implement better, later on */
01274 #if 0
01275     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM);
01276     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM);
01277     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTSHIFTKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE);
01278 #endif
01279     
01280     /* assign map to operators */
01281     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "VIEW3D_OT_move");
01282 }
01283 
01284 
01285 static void viewmove_apply(ViewOpsData *vod, int x, int y)
01286 {
01287     if ((vod->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) && !ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d)) {
01288         const float zoomfac = BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_to_fac((float)vod->rv3d->camzoom) * 2.0f;
01289         vod->rv3d->camdx += (vod->oldx - x) / (vod->ar->winx * zoomfac);
01290         vod->rv3d->camdy += (vod->oldy - y) / (vod->ar->winy * zoomfac);
01291         CLAMP(vod->rv3d->camdx, -1.0f, 1.0f);
01292         CLAMP(vod->rv3d->camdy, -1.0f, 1.0f);
01293     }
01294     else {
01295         float dvec[3];
01296         float mval_f[2];
01297 
01298         mval_f[0] = x - vod->oldx;
01299         mval_f[1] = y - vod->oldy;
01300         ED_view3d_win_to_delta(vod->ar, mval_f, dvec);
01301 
01302         add_v3_v3(vod->rv3d->ofs, dvec);
01303 
01304         if (vod->rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
01305             view3d_boxview_sync(vod->sa, vod->ar);
01306     }
01307 
01308     vod->oldx = x;
01309     vod->oldy = y;
01310 
01311     ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d);
01312 
01313     ED_region_tag_redraw(vod->ar);
01314 }
01315 
01316 
01317 static int viewmove_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01318 {
01319 
01320     ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
01321     short event_code = VIEW_PASS;
01322 
01323     /* execute the events */
01324     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
01325         event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
01326     }
01327     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
01328         switch (event->val) {
01329             case VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM:
01330                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01331                 break;
01332             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ZOOM:
01333                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_zoom", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01334                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01335                 break;
01336             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE:
01337                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_rotate", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01338                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01339                 break;
01340         }
01341     }
01342     else if (event->type == vod->origkey && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
01343         event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01344     }
01345 
01346     if (event_code == VIEW_APPLY) {
01347         viewmove_apply(vod, event->x, event->y);
01348     }
01349     else if (event_code == VIEW_CONFIRM) {
01350         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01351 
01352         viewops_data_free(C, op);
01353 
01354         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01355     }
01356 
01357     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01358 }
01359 
01360 static int viewmove_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01361 {
01362     ViewOpsData *vod;
01363 
01364     /* makes op->customdata */
01365     viewops_data_create(C, op, event);
01366     vod = op->customdata;
01367 
01368     if (event->type == MOUSEPAN) {
01369         viewmove_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy);
01370         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01371         
01372         viewops_data_free(C, op);       
01373         
01374         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01375     }
01376     else {
01377         /* add temp handler */
01378         WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01379 
01380         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01381     }
01382 }
01383 
01384 static int viewmove_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01385 {
01386     viewops_data_free(C, op);
01387 
01388     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01389 }

01391 void VIEW3D_OT_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
01392 {
01393 
01394     /* identifiers */
01395     ot->name = "Move view";
01396     ot->description = "Move the view";
01397     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_move";
01398 
01399     /* api callbacks */
01400     ot->invoke = viewmove_invoke;
01401     ot->modal = viewmove_modal;
01402     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
01403     ot->cancel = viewmove_cancel;
01404 
01405     /* flags */
01406     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING | OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
01407 }

01433

01435 #if 0

01437     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE);

01444 
01445 static void view_zoom_mouseloc(ARegion *ar, float dfac, int mx, int my)
01446 {
01447     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01448 
01449     if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_TO_MOUSEPOS) {
01450         float dvec[3];
01451         float tvec[3];
01452         float tpos[3];
01453         float mval_f[2];
01454         float new_dist;
01455 
01456         negate_v3_v3(tpos, rv3d->ofs);
01457 
01458         /* Project cursor position into 3D space */
01459         initgrabz(rv3d, tpos[0], tpos[1], tpos[2]);
01460 
01461         mval_f[0] = (float)(((mx - ar->winrct.xmin) * 2) - ar->winx) / 2.0f;
01462         mval_f[1] = (float)(((my - ar->winrct.ymin) * 2) - ar->winy) / 2.0f;
01463         ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, dvec);
01464 
01465         /* Calculate view target position for dolly */
01466         add_v3_v3v3(tvec, tpos, dvec);
01467         negate_v3(tvec);
01468 
01469         /* Offset to target position and dolly */
01470         new_dist = rv3d->dist * dfac;
01471 
01472         copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, tvec);
01473         rv3d->dist = new_dist;
01474 
01475         /* Calculate final offset */
01476         madd_v3_v3v3fl(rv3d->ofs, tvec, dvec, dfac);
01477     }
01478     else {
01479         rv3d->dist *= dfac;
01480     }
01481 }
01482 
01483 
01484 static void viewzoom_apply(ViewOpsData *vod, int x, int y, const short viewzoom, const short zoom_invert)
01485 {
01486     float zfac = 1.0;
01487     short use_cam_zoom;
01488 
01489     use_cam_zoom = (vod->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) && !(vod->rv3d->is_persp && ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d));
01490 
01491     if (use_cam_zoom) {
01492         float delta;
01493         delta = (x - vod->origx + y - vod->origy) / 10.0f;
01494         vod->rv3d->camzoom = vod->camzoom0 - delta;
01495 
01496         CLAMP(vod->rv3d->camzoom, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MIN, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MAX);
01497     }
01498     if (viewzoom == USER_ZOOM_CONT) {
01499         double time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
01500         float time_step = (float)(time - vod->timer_lastdraw);
01501         float fac;
01502 
01503         if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_HORIZ) {
01504             fac = (float)(x - vod->origx);
01505         }
01506         else {
01507             fac = (float)(y - vod->origy);
01508         }
01509 
01510         if (zoom_invert) {
01511             fac = -fac;
01512         }
01513 
01514         // oldstyle zoom
01515         zfac = 1.0f + ((fac / 20.0f) * time_step);
01516         vod->timer_lastdraw = time;
01517     }
01518     else if (viewzoom == USER_ZOOM_SCALE) {
01519         int ctr[2], len1, len2;
01520         // method which zooms based on how far you move the mouse
01521 
01522         ctr[0] = (vod->ar->winrct.xmax + vod->ar->winrct.xmin) / 2;
01523         ctr[1] = (vod->ar->winrct.ymax + vod->ar->winrct.ymin) / 2;
01524 
01525         len1 = (int)sqrt((ctr[0] - x) * (ctr[0] - x) + (ctr[1] - y) * (ctr[1] - y)) + 5;
01526         len2 = (int)sqrt((ctr[0] - vod->origx) * (ctr[0] - vod->origx) + (ctr[1] - vod->origy) * (ctr[1] - vod->origy)) + 5;
01527 
01528         zfac = vod->dist0 * ((float)len2 / len1) / vod->rv3d->dist;
01529     }
01530     else {  /* USER_ZOOM_DOLLY */
01531         float len1, len2;
01532         
01533         if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_HORIZ) {
01534             len1 = (vod->ar->winrct.xmax - x) + 5;
01535             len2 = (vod->ar->winrct.xmax - vod->origx) + 5;
01536         }
01537         else {
01538             len1 = (vod->ar->winrct.ymax - y) + 5;
01539             len2 = (vod->ar->winrct.ymax - vod->origy) + 5;
01540         }
01541         if (zoom_invert) {
01542             SWAP(float, len1, len2);
01543         }
01544         
01545         if (use_cam_zoom) {
01546             zfac = vod->camzoom0 * (2.0f * ((len2 / len1) - 1.0f) + 1.0f) / vod->rv3d->camzoom;
01547             zfac = 0;
01548         }
01549         else {
01550             zfac = vod->dist0 * (2.0f * ((len2 / len1) - 1.0f) + 1.0f) / vod->rv3d->dist;
01551         }
01552     }
01553 
01554     if (!use_cam_zoom) {
01555         if (zfac != 1.0f && zfac * vod->rv3d->dist > 0.001f * vod->grid &&
01556             zfac * vod->rv3d->dist < 10.0f * vod->far)
01557             view_zoom_mouseloc(vod->ar, zfac, vod->oldx, vod->oldy);
01558     }
01559 
01560     /* these limits were in old code too */
01561     if (vod->rv3d->dist < 0.001f * vod->grid) vod->rv3d->dist = 0.001f * vod->grid;
01562     if (vod->rv3d->dist > 10.0f * vod->far) vod->rv3d->dist = 10.0f * vod->far;
01563 
01564     if (vod->rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
01565         view3d_boxview_sync(vod->sa, vod->ar);
01566 
01567     ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d);
01568 
01569     ED_region_tag_redraw(vod->ar);
01570 }
01571 
01572 
01573 static int viewzoom_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01574 {
01575     ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
01576     short event_code = VIEW_PASS;
01577 
01578     /* execute the events */
01579     if (event->type == TIMER && event->customdata == vod->timer) {
01580         /* continuous zoom */
01581         event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
01582     }
01583     else if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
01584         event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
01585     }
01586     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
01587         switch (event->val) {
01588             case VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM:
01589                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01590                 break;
01591             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE:
01592                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_move", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01593                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01594                 break;
01595             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE:
01596                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_rotate", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01597                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01598                 break;
01599         }
01600     }
01601     else if (event->type == vod->origkey && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
01602         event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01603     }
01604 
01605     if (event_code == VIEW_APPLY) {
01606         viewzoom_apply(vod, event->x, event->y, U.viewzoom, (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_INVERT) != 0);
01607     }
01608     else if (event_code == VIEW_CONFIRM) {
01609         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01610         viewops_data_free(C, op);
01611 
01612         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01613     }
01614 
01615     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01616 }
01617 
01618 static int viewzoom_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01619 {
01620     View3D *v3d;
01621     RegionView3D *rv3d;
01622     ScrArea *sa;
01623     ARegion *ar;
01624     short use_cam_zoom;
01625 
01626     int delta = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "delta");
01627     int mx, my;
01628 
01629     if (op->customdata) {
01630         ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
01631 
01632         sa = vod->sa;
01633         ar = vod->ar;
01634     }
01635     else {
01636         sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01637         ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01638     }
01639 
01640     v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
01641     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01642 
01643     mx = RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "mx") ? RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "mx") : ar->winx / 2;
01644     my = RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "my") ? RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "my") : ar->winy / 2;
01645 
01646     use_cam_zoom = (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) && !(rv3d->is_persp && ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d));
01647 
01648     if (delta < 0) {
01649         /* this min and max is also in viewmove() */
01650         if (use_cam_zoom) {
01651             rv3d->camzoom -= 10.0f;
01652             if (rv3d->camzoom < RV3D_CAMZOOM_MIN) rv3d->camzoom = RV3D_CAMZOOM_MIN;
01653         }
01654         else if (rv3d->dist < 10.0f * v3d->far) {
01655             view_zoom_mouseloc(ar, 1.2f, mx, my);
01656         }
01657     }
01658     else {
01659         if (use_cam_zoom) {
01660             rv3d->camzoom += 10.0f;
01661             if (rv3d->camzoom > RV3D_CAMZOOM_MAX) rv3d->camzoom = RV3D_CAMZOOM_MAX;
01662         }
01663         else if (rv3d->dist > 0.001f * v3d->grid) {
01664             view_zoom_mouseloc(ar, .83333f, mx, my);
01665         }
01666     }
01667 
01668     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
01669         view3d_boxview_sync(sa, ar);
01670 
01671     ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(rv3d);
01672 
01673     ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(v3d, rv3d);
01674 
01675     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
01676 
01677     viewops_data_free(C, op);
01678 
01679     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01680 }
01681 
01682 /* this is an exact copy of viewzoom_modal_keymap */
01683 /* called in transform_ops.c, on each regeneration of keymaps  */
01684 void viewdolly_modal_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
01685 {
01686     static EnumPropertyItem modal_items[] = {
01687         {VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM,    "CONFIRM", 0, "Confirm", ""},
01688 
01689         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE, "SWITCH_TO_ROTATE", 0, "Switch to Rotate"},
01690         {VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE, "SWITCH_TO_MOVE", 0, "Switch to Move"},
01691 
01692         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01693     };
01694 
01695     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_modalkeymap_get(keyconf, "View3D Dolly Modal");
01696 
01697     /* this function is called for each spacetype, only needs to add map once */
01698     if (keymap && keymap->modal_items) return;
01699 
01700     keymap = WM_modalkeymap_add(keyconf, "View3D Dolly Modal", modal_items);
01701 
01702     /* items for modal map */
01703     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
01704     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ESCKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM);
01705 
01706     /* disabled mode switching for now, can re-implement better, later on */
01707 #if 0
01708     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE);
01709     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE);
01710     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTSHIFTKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE);
01711 #endif
01712     
01713     /* assign map to operators */
01714     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "VIEW3D_OT_dolly");
01715 }
01716 
01717 /* viewdolly_invoke() copied this function, changes here may apply there */
01718 static int viewzoom_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01719 {
01720     ViewOpsData *vod;
01721 
01722     /* makes op->customdata */
01723     viewops_data_create(C, op, event);
01724     vod = op->customdata;
01725 
01726     /* if one or the other zoom position aren't set, set from event */
01727     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "mx") || !RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "my")) {
01728         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "mx", event->x);
01729         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "my", event->y);
01730     }
01731 
01732     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "delta")) {
01733         viewzoom_exec(C, op);
01734     }
01735     else {
01736         if (event->type == MOUSEZOOM) {
01737             /* Bypass Zoom invert flag for track pads (pass FALSE always) */
01738 
01739             if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_HORIZ) {
01740                 vod->origx = vod->oldx = event->x;
01741                 viewzoom_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy, USER_ZOOM_DOLLY, FALSE);
01742             }
01743             else {
01744                 /* Set y move = x move as MOUSEZOOM uses only x axis to pass magnification value */
01745                 vod->origy = vod->oldy = vod->origy + event->x - event->prevx;
01746                 viewzoom_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy, USER_ZOOM_DOLLY, FALSE);
01747             }
01748             ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01749             
01750             viewops_data_free(C, op);
01751             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01752         }
01753         else {
01754             if (U.viewzoom == USER_ZOOM_CONT) {
01755                 /* needs a timer to continue redrawing */
01756                 vod->timer = WM_event_add_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), TIMER, 0.01f);
01757                 vod->timer_lastdraw = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
01758             }
01759 
01760             /* add temp handler */
01761             WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01762 
01763             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01764         }
01765     }
01766     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01767 }
01768 
01769 static int viewzoom_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01770 {
01771     viewops_data_free(C, op);
01772 
01773     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01774 }
01775 
01776 void VIEW3D_OT_zoom(wmOperatorType *ot)
01777 {
01778     /* identifiers */
01779     ot->name = "Zoom View";
01780     ot->description = "Zoom in/out in the view";
01781     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_zoom";
01782 
01783     /* api callbacks */
01784     ot->invoke = viewzoom_invoke;
01785     ot->exec = viewzoom_exec;
01786     ot->modal = viewzoom_modal;
01787     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
01788     ot->cancel = viewzoom_cancel;
01789 
01790     /* flags */
01791     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING | OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
01792 
01793     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "delta", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Delta", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
01794     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "mx", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Zoom Position X", "", 0, INT_MAX);
01795     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "my", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Zoom Position Y", "", 0, INT_MAX);
01796 }
01797 
01798 
01799 /* ************************ viewdolly ******************************** */
01800 static void view_dolly_mouseloc(ARegion *ar, float orig_ofs[3], float dvec[3], float dfac)
01801 {
01802     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01803     madd_v3_v3v3fl(rv3d->ofs, orig_ofs, dvec, -(1.0f - dfac));
01804 }
01805 
01806 static void viewdolly_apply(ViewOpsData *vod, int x, int y, const short zoom_invert)
01807 {
01808     float zfac = 1.0;
01809 
01810     {
01811         float len1, len2;
01812 
01813         if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_HORIZ) {
01814             len1 = (vod->ar->winrct.xmax - x) + 5;
01815             len2 = (vod->ar->winrct.xmax - vod->origx) + 5;
01816         }
01817         else {
01818             len1 = (vod->ar->winrct.ymax - y) + 5;
01819             len2 = (vod->ar->winrct.ymax - vod->origy) + 5;
01820         }
01821         if (zoom_invert)
01822             SWAP(float, len1, len2);
01823 
01824         zfac =  1.0f + ((len2 - len1) * 0.01f * vod->rv3d->dist);
01825     }
01826 
01827     if (zfac != 1.0f)
01828         view_dolly_mouseloc(vod->ar, vod->ofs, vod->mousevec, zfac);
01829 
01830     if (vod->rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
01831         view3d_boxview_sync(vod->sa, vod->ar);
01832 
01833     ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(vod->v3d, vod->rv3d);
01834 
01835     ED_region_tag_redraw(vod->ar);
01836 }
01837 
01838 
01839 static int viewdolly_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01840 {
01841     ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
01842     short event_code = VIEW_PASS;
01843 
01844     /* execute the events */
01845     if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
01846         event_code = VIEW_APPLY;
01847     }
01848     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
01849         switch (event->val) {
01850             case VIEW_MODAL_CONFIRM:
01851                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01852                 break;
01853             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_MOVE:
01854                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_move", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01855                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01856                 break;
01857             case VIEWROT_MODAL_SWITCH_ROTATE:
01858                 WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_rotate", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
01859                 event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01860                 break;
01861         }
01862     }
01863     else if (event->type == vod->origkey && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
01864         event_code = VIEW_CONFIRM;
01865     }
01866 
01867     if (event_code == VIEW_APPLY) {
01868         viewdolly_apply(vod, event->x, event->y, (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_INVERT) != 0);
01869     }
01870     else if (event_code == VIEW_CONFIRM) {
01871         ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01872         viewops_data_free(C, op);
01873 
01874         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01875     }
01876 
01877     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01878 }
01879 
01880 static int viewdolly_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01881 {
01882     /* View3D *v3d; */
01883     RegionView3D *rv3d;
01884     ScrArea *sa;
01885     ARegion *ar;
01886     float mousevec[3];
01887 
01888     int delta = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "delta");
01889 
01890     if (op->customdata) {
01891         ViewOpsData *vod = op->customdata;
01892 
01893         sa = vod->sa;
01894         ar = vod->ar;
01895         copy_v3_v3(mousevec, vod->mousevec);
01896     }
01897     else {
01898         sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01899         ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01900         negate_v3_v3(mousevec, ((RegionView3D *)ar->regiondata)->viewinv[2]);
01901         normalize_v3(mousevec);
01902     }
01903 
01904     /* v3d= sa->spacedata.first; */ /* UNUSED */
01905     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01906 
01907     /* overwrite the mouse vector with the view direction (zoom into the center) */
01908     if ((U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_TO_MOUSEPOS) == 0) {
01909         normalize_v3_v3(mousevec, rv3d->viewinv[2]);
01910     }
01911 
01912     if (delta < 0) {
01913         view_dolly_mouseloc(ar, rv3d->ofs, mousevec, 1.2f);
01914     }
01915     else {
01916         view_dolly_mouseloc(ar, rv3d->ofs, mousevec, .83333f);
01917     }
01918 
01919     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
01920         view3d_boxview_sync(sa, ar);
01921 
01922     ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(rv3d);
01923     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
01924 
01925     viewops_data_free(C, op);
01926 
01927     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01928 }
01929 
01930 /* copied from viewzoom_invoke(), changes here may apply there */
01931 static int viewdolly_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01932 {
01933     ViewOpsData *vod;
01934 
01935     /* makes op->customdata */
01936     viewops_data_create(C, op, event);
01937     vod = op->customdata;
01938 
01939     /* if one or the other zoom position aren't set, set from event */
01940     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "mx") || !RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "my")) {
01941         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "mx", event->x);
01942         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "my", event->y);
01943     }
01944 
01945     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "delta")) {
01946         viewdolly_exec(C, op);
01947     }
01948     else {
01949         /* overwrite the mouse vector with the view direction (zoom into the center) */
01950         if ((U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_TO_MOUSEPOS) == 0) {
01951             negate_v3_v3(vod->mousevec, vod->rv3d->viewinv[2]);
01952             normalize_v3(vod->mousevec);
01953         }
01954 
01955         if (event->type == MOUSEZOOM) {
01956             /* Bypass Zoom invert flag for track pads (pass FALSE always) */
01957 
01958             if (U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_HORIZ) {
01959                 vod->origx = vod->oldx = event->x;
01960                 viewdolly_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy, FALSE);
01961             }
01962             else {
01963 
01964                 /* Set y move = x move as MOUSEZOOM uses only x axis to pass magnification value */
01965                 vod->origy = vod->oldy = vod->origy + event->x - event->prevx;
01966                 viewdolly_apply(vod, event->prevx, event->prevy, FALSE);
01967             }
01968             ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(vod->rv3d);
01969 
01970             viewops_data_free(C, op);
01971             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01972         }
01973         else {
01974             /* add temp handler */
01975             WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01976 
01977             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01978         }
01979     }
01980     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01981 }
01982 
01983 /* like ED_operator_region_view3d_active but check its not in ortho view */
01984 static int viewdolly_poll(bContext *C)
01985 {
01986     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
01987 
01988     if (rv3d) {
01989         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_PERSP) {
01990             return 1;
01991         }
01992         else {
01993             View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01994             if (ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
01995                 return 1;
01996             }
01997         }
01998     }
01999     return 0;
02000 }
02001 
02002 static int viewdolly_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02003 {
02004     viewops_data_free(C, op);
02005 
02006     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02007 }

02009 void VIEW3D_OT_dolly(wmOperatorType *ot)
02010 {
02011     /* identifiers */
02012     ot->name = "Dolly view";
02013     ot->description = "Dolly in/out in the view";
02014     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_dolly";
02015

02017     ot->invoke = viewdolly_invoke;
02018     ot->exec = viewdolly_exec;
02019     ot->modal = viewdolly_modal;
02020     ot->poll = viewdolly_poll;
02021     ot->cancel = viewdolly_cancel;
02022 
02023     /* flags */
02024     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING | OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
02025 
02026     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "delta", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Delta", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02027     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "mx", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Zoom Position X", "", 0, INT_MAX);
02028     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "my", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Zoom Position Y", "", 0, INT_MAX);
02029 }
