02031 
02032 
02033 static int view3d_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op) /* was view3d_home() in 2.4x */
02034 {
02035     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02036     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02037     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02038     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02039     Base *base;
02040     float *curs;
02041     const short skip_camera = ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d);
02042 
02043     int center = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "center");
02044 
02045     float size, min[3], max[3], afm[3];
02046     int ok = 1, onedone = 0;
02047 
02048     if (center) {
02049         /* in 2.4x this also move the cursor to (0, 0, 0) (with shift+c). */
02050         curs = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
02051         zero_v3(min);
02052         zero_v3(max);
02053         zero_v3(curs);
02054     }
02055     else {
02056         INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
02057     }
02058 
02059     for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
02060         if (BASE_VISIBLE(v3d, base)) {
02061             onedone = 1;
02062 
02063             if (skip_camera && base->object == v3d->camera) {
02064                 continue;
02065             }
02066 
02067             minmax_object(base->object, min, max);
02068         }
02069     }
02070     if (!onedone) {
02071         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
02072         /* TODO - should this be cancel?
02073          * I think no, because we always move the cursor, with or without
02074          * object, but in this case there is no change in the scene,
02075          * only the cursor so I choice a ED_region_tag like
02076          * smooth_view do for the center_cursor.
02077          * See bug #22640
02078          */
02079         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02080     }
02081 
02082     sub_v3_v3v3(afm, max, min);
02083     size = 0.7f * MAX3(afm[0], afm[1], afm[2]);
02084     if (size == 0.0f) ok = 0;
02085 
02086     if (ok) {
02087         float new_dist;
02088         float new_ofs[3];
02089 
02090         new_dist = size;
02091         new_ofs[0] = -(min[0] + max[0]) / 2.0f;
02092         new_ofs[1] = -(min[1] + max[1]) / 2.0f;
02093         new_ofs[2] = -(min[2] + max[2]) / 2.0f;
02094 
02095         // correction for window aspect ratio
02096         if (ar->winy > 2 && ar->winx > 2) {
02097             size = (float)ar->winx / (float)ar->winy;
02098             if (size < 1.0f) size = 1.0f / size;
02099             new_dist *= size;
02100         }
02101 
02102         if ((rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) && !ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
02103             rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
02104             smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, v3d->camera, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, &new_dist, NULL);
02105         }
02106         else {
02107             smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, &new_dist, NULL);
02108         }
02109     }
02110 // XXX  BIF_view3d_previewrender_signal(curarea, PR_DBASE|PR_DISPRECT);
02111 
02112     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
02113 
02114     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02115 }
02116 
02117 
02118 void VIEW3D_OT_view_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
02119 {
02120     /* identifiers */
02121     ot->name = "View All";
02122     ot->description = "View all objects in scene";
02123     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_view_all";
02124 
02125     /* api callbacks */
02126     ot->exec = view3d_all_exec;
02127     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
02128 
02129     /* flags */
02130     ot->flag = 0;
02131 
02132     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "center", 0, "Center", "");
02133 }
02134 
02135 /* like a localview without local!, was centerview() in 2.4x */
02136 static int viewselected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02137 {
02138     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02139     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02140     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02141     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02142     Object *ob = OBACT;
02143     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02144     float size, min[3], max[3], afm[3];
02145     int ok = 0, ok_dist = 1;
02146     const short skip_camera = ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d);
02147 
02148     /* SMOOTHVIEW */
02149     float new_ofs[3];
02150     float new_dist;
02151 
02152     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
02153 
02154     if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
02155         /* hard-coded exception, we look for the one selected armature */
02156         /* this is weak code this way, we should make a generic active/selection callback interface once... */
02157         Base *base;
02158         for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
02159             if (TESTBASELIB(v3d, base)) {
02160                 if (base->object->type == OB_ARMATURE)
02161                     if (base->object->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
02162                         break;
02163             }
02164         }
02165         if (base)
02166             ob = base->object;
02167     }
02168 
02169 
02170     if (obedit) {
02171         ok = minmax_verts(obedit, min, max);    /* only selected */
02172     }
02173     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
02174         if (ob->pose) {
02175             bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02176             bPoseChannel *pchan;
02177             float vec[3];
02178 
02179             for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02180                 if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
02181                     if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) {
02182                         bPoseChannel *pchan_tx = pchan->custom_tx ? pchan->custom_tx : pchan;
02183                         ok = 1;
02184                         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan_tx->pose_head);
02185                         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02186                         mul_v3_m4v3(vec, ob->obmat, pchan_tx->pose_tail);
02187                         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
02188                     }
02189                 }
02190             }
02191         }
02192     }
02193     else if (paint_facesel_test(ob)) {
02194         ok = paintface_minmax(ob, min, max);
02195     }
02196     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)) {
02197         ok = PE_minmax(scene, min, max);
02198     }
02199     else {
02200         Base *base;
02201         for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
02202             if (TESTBASE(v3d, base)) {
02203 
02204                 if (skip_camera && base->object == v3d->camera) {
02205                     continue;
02206                 }
02207 
02208                 /* account for duplis */
02209                 if (minmax_object_duplis(scene, base->object, min, max) == 0)
02210                     minmax_object(base->object, min, max);  /* use if duplis not found */
02211 
02212                 ok = 1;
02213             }
02214         }
02215     }
02216 
02217     if (ok == 0) return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02218 
02219     sub_v3_v3v3(afm, max, min);
02220     size = MAX3(afm[0], afm[1], afm[2]);
02221 
02222     if (!rv3d->is_persp) {
02223         if (size < 0.0001f) { /* if its a sinble point. don't even re-scale */
02224             ok_dist = 0;
02225         }
02226         else {
02227             /* perspective should be a bit farther away to look nice */
02228             size *= 0.7f;
02229         }
02230     }
02231     else {
02232         if (size <= v3d->near * 1.5f) {
02233             size = v3d->near * 1.5f;
02234         }
02235     }
02236 
02237     add_v3_v3v3(new_ofs, min, max);
02238     mul_v3_fl(new_ofs, -0.5f);
02239 
02240     new_dist = size;
02241 
02242     /* correction for window aspect ratio */
02243     if (ar->winy > 2 && ar->winx > 2) {
02244         size = (float)ar->winx / (float)ar->winy;
02245         if (size < 1.0f) size = 1.0f / size;
02246         new_dist *= size;
02247     }
02248 
02249     if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && !ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
02250         rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
02251         smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, v3d->camera, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, &new_dist, NULL);
02252     }
02253     else {
02254         smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, ok_dist ? &new_dist : NULL, NULL);
02255     }
02256 
02257     /* smooth view does viewlock RV3D_BOXVIEW copy */
02258     
02259 // XXX  BIF_view3d_previewrender_signal(curarea, PR_DBASE|PR_DISPRECT);
02260 
02261     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02262 }
02263 
02264 void VIEW3D_OT_view_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)
02265 {
02266 
02267     /* identifiers */
02268     ot->name = "View Selected";
02269     ot->description = "Move the view to the selection center";
02270     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_view_selected";
02271

02273     ot->exec = viewselected_exec;
02274     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
02275

02278 }
02279 
02280 static int viewcenter_cursor_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02281 {
02282     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02283     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02284     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02285     
02286     if (rv3d) {
02287         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02288 
02289         /* non camera center */
02290         float new_ofs[3];
02291         negate_v3_v3(new_ofs, give_cursor(scene, v3d));
02292         smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02293         
02294         /* smooth view does viewlock RV3D_BOXVIEW copy */
02295     }
02296     
02297     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02298 }

02314 
02315 static int view3d_center_camera_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op)) /* was view3d_home() in 2.4x */
02316 {
02317     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02318     float xfac, yfac;
02319     float size[2];
02320 
02321     View3D *v3d;
02322     ARegion *ar;
02323     RegionView3D *rv3d;
02324 
02325     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
02326     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar);
02327     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
02328 
02329     rv3d->camdx = rv3d->camdy = 0.0f;
02330 
02331     ED_view3d_calc_camera_border_size(scene, ar, v3d, rv3d, size);
02332 
02333     /* 4px is just a little room from the edge of the area */
02334     xfac = (float)ar->winx / (float)(size[0] + 4);
02335     yfac = (float)ar->winy / (float)(size[1] + 4);
02336 
02337     rv3d->camzoom = BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_from_fac(MIN2(xfac, yfac));
02338     CLAMP(rv3d->camzoom, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MIN, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MAX);
02339 
02340     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, CTX_wm_view3d(C));
02341 
02342     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02343 }
02344

02346 {

02348     ot->name = "View Camera Center";
02349     ot->description = "Center the camera view";

02359 
02360 /* ********************* Set render border operator ****************** */
02361 
02362 static int render_border_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02363 {
02364     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02365     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02366     RegionView3D *rv3d = ED_view3d_context_rv3d(C);
02367     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02368 
02369     rcti rect;
02370     rctf vb;
02371 
02372     /* get border select values using rna */
02373     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
02374     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
02375     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
02376     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
02377 
02378     /* calculate range */
02379     ED_view3d_calc_camera_border(scene, ar, v3d, rv3d, &vb, FALSE);
02380 
02381     scene->r.border.xmin = ((float)rect.xmin - vb.xmin) / (vb.xmax - vb.xmin);
02382     scene->r.border.ymin = ((float)rect.ymin - vb.ymin) / (vb.ymax - vb.ymin);
02383     scene->r.border.xmax = ((float)rect.xmax - vb.xmin) / (vb.xmax - vb.xmin);
02384     scene->r.border.ymax = ((float)rect.ymax - vb.ymin) / (vb.ymax - vb.ymin);
02385 
02386     /* actually set border */
02387     CLAMP(scene->r.border.xmin, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02388     CLAMP(scene->r.border.ymin, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02389     CLAMP(scene->r.border.xmax, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02390     CLAMP(scene->r.border.ymax, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02391 
02392     /* drawing a border surrounding the entire camera view switches off border rendering
02393      * or the border covers no pixels */
02394     if ((scene->r.border.xmin <= 0.0f && scene->r.border.xmax >= 1.0f &&
02395          scene->r.border.ymin <= 0.0f && scene->r.border.ymax >= 1.0f) ||
02396         (scene->r.border.xmin == scene->r.border.xmax ||
02397          scene->r.border.ymin == scene->r.border.ymax))
02398     {
02399         scene->r.mode &= ~R_BORDER;
02400     }
02401     else {
02402         scene->r.mode |= R_BORDER;
02403     }
02404     
02405     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_RENDER_OPTIONS, NULL);
02406 
02407     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02408 
02409 }
02410 
02411 void VIEW3D_OT_render_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
02412 {
02413     /* identifiers */
02414     ot->name = "Set Render Border";
02415     ot->description = "Set the boundaries of the border render and enables border render";
02416     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_render_border";
02417 
02418     /* api callbacks */
02419     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
02420     ot->exec = render_border_exec;
02421     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
02422     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
02423 
02424     ot->poll = view3d_camera_active_poll;
02425 
02426     /* flags */
02427     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02428 
02429     /* rna */
02430     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02431     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02432     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02433     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02434 
02435 }
02436 /* ********************* Border Zoom operator ****************** */
02437 
02438 static int view3d_zoom_border_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02439 {
02440     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02441     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02442     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02443     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02444 
02445     /* Zooms in on a border drawn by the user */
02446     rcti rect;
02447     float dvec[3], vb[2], xscale, yscale, scale;
02448 
02449     /* SMOOTHVIEW */
02450     float new_dist;
02451     float new_ofs[3];
02452 
02453     /* ZBuffer depth vars */
02454     bglMats mats;
02455     float depth_close = FLT_MAX;
02456     double cent[2],  p[3];
02457 
02458     /* note; otherwise opengl won't work */
02459     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
02460 
02461     /* get border select values using rna */
02462     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
02463     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
02464     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
02465     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
02466 
02467     /* Get Z Depths, needed for perspective, nice for ortho */
02468     bgl_get_mats(&mats);
02469     draw_depth(scene, ar, v3d, NULL);
02470     
02471     {
02472         /* avoid allocating the whole depth buffer */
02473         ViewDepths depth_temp = {0};
02474 
02475         /* avoid view3d_update_depths() for speed. */
02476         view3d_update_depths_rect(ar, &depth_temp, &rect);
02477     
02478         /* find the closest Z pixel */
02479         depth_close = view3d_depth_near(&depth_temp);
02480     
02481         MEM_freeN(depth_temp.depths);
02482     }
02483 
02484     cent[0] = (((double)rect.xmin) + ((double)rect.xmax)) / 2;
02485     cent[1] = (((double)rect.ymin) + ((double)rect.ymax)) / 2;
02486 
02487     if (rv3d->is_persp) {
02488         double p_corner[3];
02489 
02490         /* no depths to use, we cant do anything! */
02491         if (depth_close == FLT_MAX) {
02492             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Depth Too Large");
02493             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02494         }
02495         /* convert border to 3d coordinates */
02496         if ( (!gluUnProject(cent[0], cent[1], depth_close,
02497                             mats.modelview, mats.projection, (GLint *)mats.viewport,
02498                             &p[0], &p[1], &p[2])) ||
02499              (!gluUnProject((double)rect.xmin, (double)rect.ymin, depth_close,
02500                             mats.modelview, mats.projection, (GLint *)mats.viewport,
02501                             &p_corner[0], &p_corner[1], &p_corner[2])))
02502         {
02503             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02504         }
02505 
02506         dvec[0] = p[0] - p_corner[0];
02507         dvec[1] = p[1] - p_corner[1];
02508         dvec[2] = p[2] - p_corner[2];
02509 
02510         new_dist = len_v3(dvec);
02511         if (new_dist <= v3d->near * 1.5f) new_dist = v3d->near * 1.5f;
02512 
02513         new_ofs[0] = -p[0];
02514         new_ofs[1] = -p[1];
02515         new_ofs[2] = -p[2];
02516 
02517     }
02518     else { /* othographic */
02519            /* find the current window width and height */
02520         vb[0] = ar->winx;
02521         vb[1] = ar->winy;
02522 
02523         new_dist = rv3d->dist;
02524 
02525         /* convert the drawn rectangle into 3d space */
02526         if (depth_close != FLT_MAX && gluUnProject(cent[0], cent[1], depth_close,
02527                                                    mats.modelview, mats.projection, (GLint *)mats.viewport,
02528                                                    &p[0], &p[1], &p[2]))
02529         {
02530             new_ofs[0] = -p[0];
02531             new_ofs[1] = -p[1];
02532             new_ofs[2] = -p[2];
02533         }
02534         else {
02535             float mval_f[2];
02536             /* We cant use the depth, fallback to the old way that dosnt set the center depth */
02537             copy_v3_v3(new_ofs, rv3d->ofs);
02538 
02539             initgrabz(rv3d, -new_ofs[0], -new_ofs[1], -new_ofs[2]);
02540 
02541             mval_f[0] = (rect.xmin + rect.xmax - vb[0]) / 2.0f;
02542             mval_f[1] = (rect.ymin + rect.ymax - vb[1]) / 2.0f;
02543             ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, dvec);
02544             /* center the view to the center of the rectangle */
02545             sub_v3_v3(new_ofs, dvec);
02546         }
02547 
02548         /* work out the ratios, so that everything selected fits when we zoom */
02549         xscale = ((rect.xmax - rect.xmin) / vb[0]);
02550         yscale = ((rect.ymax - rect.ymin) / vb[1]);
02551         scale = (xscale >= yscale) ? xscale : yscale;
02552 
02553         /* zoom in as required, or as far as we can go */
02554         new_dist = ((new_dist * scale) >= 0.001f * v3d->grid) ? new_dist * scale : 0.001f * v3d->grid;
02555     }
02556 
02557     smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, NULL, new_ofs, NULL, &new_dist, NULL);
02558 
02559     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
02560         view3d_boxview_sync(CTX_wm_area(C), ar);
02561 
02562     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02563 }
02564 
02565 static int view3d_zoom_border_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02566 {
02567     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
02568     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02569 
02570     /* if in camera view do not exec the operator so we do not conflict with set render border*/
02571     if ((rv3d->persp != RV3D_CAMOB) || ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d))
02572         return WM_border_select_invoke(C, op, event);
02573     else
02574         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02575 }
02576

02586     ot->exec = view3d_zoom_border_exec;
02587     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
02588     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
02589 
02590     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
02591 
02592     /* flags */
02593     ot->flag = 0;
02594 
02595     /* rna */
02596     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02597     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02598     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02599     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02600 
02601 }
02602 
02603 /* sets the view to 1:1 camera/render-pixel */
02604 static void view3d_set_1_to_1_viewborder(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d)
02605 {
02606     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
02607     float size[2];
02608     int im_width = (scene->r.size * scene->r.xsch) / 100;
02609     
02610     ED_view3d_calc_camera_border_size(scene, ar, v3d, rv3d, size);
02611 
02612     rv3d->camzoom = BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_from_fac((float)im_width / size[0]);
02613     CLAMP(rv3d->camzoom, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MIN, RV3D_CAMZOOM_MAX);
02614 }
02615 
02616 static int view3d_zoom_1_to_1_camera_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02617 {
02618     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02619 
02620     View3D *v3d;
02621     ARegion *ar;
02622 
02623     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
02624     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar);
02625 
02626     view3d_set_1_to_1_viewborder(scene, ar, v3d);
02627 
02628     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
02629 
02630     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02631 }
02632 
02633 void VIEW3D_OT_zoom_camera_1_to_1(wmOperatorType *ot)

02648 /* ********************* Changing view operator ****************** */
02649 
02650 static EnumPropertyItem prop_view_items[] = {
02651     {RV3D_VIEW_FRONT, "FRONT", 0, "Front", "View From the Front"},
02652     {RV3D_VIEW_BACK, "BACK", 0, "Back", "View From the Back"},
02653     {RV3D_VIEW_LEFT, "LEFT", 0, "Left", "View From the Left"},
02654     {RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT, "RIGHT", 0, "Right", "View From the Right"},
02655     {RV3D_VIEW_TOP, "TOP", 0, "Top", "View From the Top"},
02656     {RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM, "BOTTOM", 0, "Bottom", "View From the Bottom"},
02657     {RV3D_VIEW_CAMERA, "CAMERA", 0, "Camera", "View From the active camera"},
02658     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
02659 };
02660 
02661 
02662 /* would like to make this a generic function - outside of transform */
02663 
02664 static void axis_set_view(bContext *C, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar,
02665                           float q1, float q2, float q3, float q4,
02666                           short view, int perspo, int align_active)
02667 {
02668     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata; /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
02669     float new_quat[4];
02670 
02671     new_quat[0] = q1; new_quat[1] = q2;
02672     new_quat[2] = q3; new_quat[3] = q4;
02673     normalize_qt(new_quat);
02674 
02675     if (align_active) {
02676         /* align to active object */
02677         Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02678         if (obact == NULL) {
02679             /* no active object, ignore this option */
02680             align_active = FALSE;
02681         }
02682         else {
02683             float obact_quat[4];
02684             float twmat[3][3];
02685 
02686             /* same as transform manipulator when normal is set */
02687             ED_getTransformOrientationMatrix(C, twmat, FALSE);
02688 
02689             mat3_to_quat(obact_quat, twmat);
02690             invert_qt(obact_quat);
02691             mul_qt_qtqt(new_quat, new_quat, obact_quat);
02692 
02693             rv3d->view = view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
02694         }
02695     }
02696 
02697     if (align_active == FALSE) {
02698         /* normal operation */
02699         if (rv3d->viewlock) {
02700             /* only pass on if */
02701 
02702             /* nice confusing if-block */
02703             if (!((rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_FRONT  && view == RV3D_VIEW_BACK)  ||
02704                   (rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_BACK   && view == RV3D_VIEW_FRONT) ||
02705                   (rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT  && view == RV3D_VIEW_LEFT)  ||
02706                   (rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_LEFT   && view == RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT) ||
02707                   (rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM && view == RV3D_VIEW_TOP)   ||
02708                   (rv3d->view == RV3D_VIEW_TOP    && view == RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM)))
02709             {
02710                 return;
02711             }
02712         }
02713 
02714         rv3d->view = view;
02715     }
02716 
02717     if (rv3d->viewlock) {
02718         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
02719         return;
02720     }
02721 
02722     if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && v3d->camera) {
02723 
02724         if (U.uiflag & USER_AUTOPERSP) rv3d->persp = view ? RV3D_ORTHO : RV3D_PERSP;
02725         else if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) rv3d->persp = perspo;
02726 
02727         smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, v3d->camera, NULL, rv3d->ofs, new_quat, NULL, NULL);
02728     }
02729     else {
02730 
02731         if (U.uiflag & USER_AUTOPERSP) rv3d->persp = view ? RV3D_ORTHO : RV3D_PERSP;
02732         else if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) rv3d->persp = perspo;
02733 
02734         smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, NULL, NULL, new_quat, NULL, NULL);
02735     }
02736 
02737 }
02738 
02739 static int viewnumpad_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02740 {
02741     View3D *v3d;
02742     ARegion *ar;
02743     RegionView3D *rv3d;
02744     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02745     static int perspo = RV3D_PERSP;
02746     int viewnum, align_active, nextperspo;
02747 
02748     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
02749     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar);
02750     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
02751 
02752     viewnum = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02753     align_active = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "align_active");
02754 
02755     /* set this to zero, gets handled in axis_set_view */
02756     if (rv3d->viewlock)
02757         align_active = 0;
02758 
02759     /* Use this to test if we started out with a camera */
02760 
02761     if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
02762         nextperspo = rv3d->lpersp;
02763     }
02764     else {
02765         nextperspo = perspo;
02766     }
02767 
02768     switch (viewnum) {
02769         case RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM:
02770             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, 0.0, -1.0, 0.0, 0.0,
02771                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02772             break;
02773 
02774         case RV3D_VIEW_BACK:
02775             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, 0.0, 0.0, (float)-cos(M_PI / 4.0), (float)-cos(M_PI / 4.0),
02776                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02777             break;
02778 
02779         case RV3D_VIEW_LEFT:
02780             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, 0.5, -0.5, 0.5, 0.5,
02781                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02782             break;
02783 
02784         case RV3D_VIEW_TOP:
02785             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
02786                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02787             break;
02788 
02789         case RV3D_VIEW_FRONT:
02790             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, (float)cos(M_PI / 4.0), (float)-sin(M_PI / 4.0), 0.0, 0.0,
02791                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02792             break;
02793 
02794         case RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT:
02795             axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar, 0.5, -0.5, -0.5, -0.5,
02796                           viewnum, nextperspo, align_active);
02797             break;
02798 
02799         case RV3D_VIEW_CAMERA:
02800             if (rv3d->viewlock == 0) {
02801                 /* lastview -  */
02802 
02803                 if (rv3d->persp != RV3D_CAMOB) {
02804                     Object *ob = OBACT;
02805 
02806                     if (!rv3d->smooth_timer) {
02807                         /* store settings of current view before allowing overwriting with camera view
02808                          * only if we're not currently in a view transition */
02809                         copy_qt_qt(rv3d->lviewquat, rv3d->viewquat);
02810                         rv3d->lview = rv3d->view;
02811                         rv3d->lpersp = rv3d->persp;
02812                     }
02813 
02814     #if 0
02815                     if (G.qual == LR_ALTKEY) {
02816                         if (oldcamera && is_an_active_object(oldcamera)) {
02817                             v3d->camera = oldcamera;
02818                         }
02819                         handle_view3d_lock();
02820                     }
02821     #endif
02822                     
02823                     /* first get the default camera for the view lock type */
02824                     if (v3d->scenelock) {
02825                         /* sets the camera view if available */
02826                         v3d->camera = scene->camera;
02827                     }
02828                     else {
02829                         /* use scene camera if one is not set (even though we're unlocked) */
02830                         if (v3d->camera == NULL) {
02831                             v3d->camera = scene->camera;
02832                         }
02833                     }
02834 
02835                     /* if the camera isn't found, check a number of options */
02836                     if (v3d->camera == NULL && ob && ob->type == OB_CAMERA)
02837                         v3d->camera = ob;
02838                     
02839                     if (v3d->camera == NULL)
02840                         v3d->camera = scene_find_camera(scene);
02841 
02842                     /* couldnt find any useful camera, bail out */
02843                     if (v3d->camera == NULL)
02844                         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02845                     
02846                     /* important these don't get out of sync for locked scenes */
02847                     if (v3d->scenelock)
02848                         scene->camera = v3d->camera;
02849 
02850                     /* finally do snazzy view zooming */
02851                     rv3d->persp = RV3D_CAMOB;
02852                     smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, NULL, v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, &rv3d->dist, &v3d->lens);
02853 
02854                 }
02855                 else {
02856                     /* return to settings of last view */
02857                     /* does smooth_view too */
02858                     axis_set_view(C, v3d, ar,
02859                                   rv3d->lviewquat[0], rv3d->lviewquat[1], rv3d->lviewquat[2], rv3d->lviewquat[3],
02860                                   rv3d->lview, rv3d->lpersp, 0);
02861                 }
02862             }
02863             break;
02864 
02865         default:
02866             break;
02867     }
02868 
02869     if (rv3d->persp != RV3D_CAMOB) perspo = rv3d->persp;
02870 
02871     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02872 }
02873

02875 void VIEW3D_OT_viewnumpad(wmOperatorType *ot)
02876 {
02877     PropertyRNA *prop;
02878 
02879     /* identifiers */
02880     ot->name = "View numpad";
02881     ot->description = "Set the view";
02882     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_viewnumpad";
02883 
02884     /* api callbacks */
02885     ot->exec = viewnumpad_exec;
02886     ot->poll = ED_operator_rv3d_user_region_poll;
02887 
02888     /* flags */
02889     ot->flag = 0;
02890 
02891     prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_view_items, 0, "View", "The Type of view");
02892     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
02893     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "align_active", 0, "Align Active", "Align to the active object's axis");
02894     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
02895 }
02896 
02897 static EnumPropertyItem prop_view_orbit_items[] = {
02898     {V3D_VIEW_STEPLEFT, "ORBITLEFT", 0, "Orbit Left", "Orbit the view around to the Left"},
02899     {V3D_VIEW_STEPRIGHT, "ORBITRIGHT", 0, "Orbit Right", "Orbit the view around to the Right"},
02900     {V3D_VIEW_STEPUP, "ORBITUP", 0, "Orbit Up", "Orbit the view Up"},
02901     {V3D_VIEW_STEPDOWN, "ORBITDOWN", 0, "Orbit Down", "Orbit the view Down"},
02902     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
02903 };
02904 
02905 static int vieworbit_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02906 {
02907     View3D *v3d;
02908     ARegion *ar;
02909     RegionView3D *rv3d;
02910     float phi, q1[4], new_quat[4];
02911     int orbitdir;
02912 
02913     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
02914     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar);
02915     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
02916 
02917     orbitdir = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02918 
02919     if (rv3d->viewlock == 0) {
02920         if ((rv3d->persp != RV3D_CAMOB) || ED_view3d_camera_lock_check(v3d, rv3d)) {
02921             if (orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPLEFT || orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPRIGHT) {
02922                 float si;
02923                 /* z-axis */
02924                 phi = (float)(M_PI / 360.0) * U.pad_rot_angle;
02925                 if (orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPRIGHT) phi = -phi;
02926                 si = (float)sin(phi);
02927                 q1[0] = (float)cos(phi);
02928                 q1[1] = q1[2] = 0.0;
02929                 q1[3] = si;
02930                 mul_qt_qtqt(new_quat, rv3d->viewquat, q1);
02931                 rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
02932             }
02933             else if (orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPDOWN || orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPUP) {
02934                 /* horizontal axis */
02935                 copy_v3_v3(q1 + 1, rv3d->viewinv[0]);
02936 
02937                 normalize_v3(q1 + 1);
02938                 phi = (float)(M_PI / 360.0) * U.pad_rot_angle;
02939                 if (orbitdir == V3D_VIEW_STEPDOWN) phi = -phi;
02940                 q1[0] = (float)cos(phi);
02941                 mul_v3_fl(q1 + 1, sin(phi));
02942                 mul_qt_qtqt(new_quat, rv3d->viewquat, q1);
02943                 rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
02944             }
02945 
02946             smooth_view(C, CTX_wm_view3d(C), ar, NULL, NULL, NULL, new_quat, NULL, NULL);
02947         }
02948     }
02949 
02950     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02951 }
02952 
02953 void VIEW3D_OT_view_orbit(wmOperatorType *ot)
02954 {
02955     /* identifiers */
02956     ot->name = "View Orbit";
02957     ot->description = "Orbit the view";
02958     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_view_orbit";
02959 
02960     /* api callbacks */
02961     ot->exec = vieworbit_exec;
02962     ot->poll = ED_operator_rv3d_user_region_poll;
02963 
02964     /* flags */
02965     ot->flag = 0;
02966     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_view_orbit_items, 0, "Orbit", "Direction of View Orbit");
02967 }
02968 
02969 static EnumPropertyItem prop_view_pan_items[] = {
02970     {V3D_VIEW_PANLEFT, "PANLEFT", 0, "Pan Left", "Pan the view to the Left"},
02971     {V3D_VIEW_PANRIGHT, "PANRIGHT", 0, "Pan Right", "Pan the view to the Right"},
02972     {V3D_VIEW_PANUP, "PANUP", 0, "Pan Up", "Pan the view Up"},
02973     {V3D_VIEW_PANDOWN, "PANDOWN", 0, "Pan Down", "Pan the view Down"},
02974     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
02975 };
02976 
02977 static int viewpan_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02978 {
02979     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02980     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
02981     float vec[3];
02982     float mval_f[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f};
02983     int pandir;
02984 
02985     pandir = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02986 
02987     initgrabz(rv3d, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
02988     if      (pandir == V3D_VIEW_PANRIGHT)  { mval_f[0] = -32.0f; ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, vec); }
02989     else if (pandir == V3D_VIEW_PANLEFT)   { mval_f[0] =  32.0f; ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, vec); }
02990     else if (pandir == V3D_VIEW_PANUP)     { mval_f[1] = -25.0f; ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, vec); }
02991     else if (pandir == V3D_VIEW_PANDOWN)   { mval_f[1] =  25.0f; ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, vec); }
02992     add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, vec);
02993 
02994     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
02995         view3d_boxview_sync(CTX_wm_area(C), ar);
02996 
02997     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
02998 
02999     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03000 }

03018 static int viewpersportho_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03019 {
03020     View3D *v3d_dummy;
03021     ARegion *ar;
03022     RegionView3D *rv3d;
03023 
03024     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
03025     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d_dummy, &ar);
03026     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
03027 
03028     if (rv3d->viewlock == 0) {
03029         if (rv3d->persp != RV3D_ORTHO)
03030             rv3d->persp = RV3D_ORTHO;
03031         else rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
03032         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
03033     }
03034 
03035     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03036 
03037 }

03055 /* ******************** add background image operator **************** */
03056 
03057 static BGpic *background_image_add(bContext *C)
03058 {
03059     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
03060 
03061     return ED_view3D_background_image_new(v3d);
03062 }
03063 
03064 static int background_image_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03065 {
03066     background_image_add(C);
03067 
03068     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03069 }
03070 
03071 static int background_image_add_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
03072 {
03073     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
03074     Image *ima = NULL;
03075     BGpic *bgpic;
03076     char name[MAX_ID_NAME - 2];
03077     
03078     /* check input variables */
03079     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
03080         char path[FILE_MAX];
03081         
03082         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
03083         ima = BKE_add_image_file(path);
03084     }
03085     else if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "name")) {
03086         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", name);
03087         ima = (Image *)find_id("IM", name);
03088     }
03089     
03090     bgpic = background_image_add(C);
03091     
03092     if (ima) {
03093         bgpic->ima = ima;
03094         
03095         if (ima->id.us == 0) id_us_plus(&ima->id);
03096         else id_lib_extern(&ima->id);
03097         
03098         if (!(v3d->flag & V3D_DISPBGPICS))
03099             v3d->flag |= V3D_DISPBGPICS;
03100     }
03101     
03102     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
03103     
03104     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03105 }

03124     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "filepath", "Path", FILE_MAX, "Filepath", "Path to image file");

03139     }
03140     else {
03141         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03142     }
03143

03162 
03163 /* ********************* set clipping operator ****************** */
03164 
03165 static void calc_clipping_plane(float clip[6][4], BoundBox *clipbb)
03166 {
03167     int val;
03168 
03169     for (val = 0; val < 4; val++) {
03170 
03171         normal_tri_v3(clip[val], clipbb->vec[val], clipbb->vec[val == 3 ? 0 : val + 1], clipbb->vec[val + 4]);
03172 
03173         /* TODO - this is just '-dot_v3v3(clip[val], clipbb->vec[val])' isnt it? - sould replace */
03174         clip[val][3] = -clip[val][0] * clipbb->vec[val][0] -
03175                         clip[val][1] * clipbb->vec[val][1] -
03176                         clip[val][2] * clipbb->vec[val][2];
03177     }
03178 }
03179 
03180 static void calc_local_clipping(float clip_local[][4], BoundBox *clipbb, float mat[][4])
03181 {
03182     BoundBox clipbb_local;
03183     float imat[4][4];
03184     int i;
03185 
03186     invert_m4_m4(imat, mat);
03187 
03188     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
03189         mul_v3_m4v3(clipbb_local.vec[i], imat, clipbb->vec[i]);
03190     }
03191 
03192     calc_clipping_plane(clip_local, &clipbb_local);
03193 }
03194 
03195 void ED_view3d_clipping_local(RegionView3D *rv3d, float mat[][4])
03196 {
03197     if (rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING)
03198         calc_local_clipping(rv3d->clip_local, rv3d->clipbb, mat);
03199 }
03200 
03201 static int view3d_clipping_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03202 {
03203     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
03204     ViewContext vc;
03205     bglMats mats;
03206     rcti rect;
03207 
03208     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
03209     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
03210     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
03211     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
03212 
03213     rv3d->rflag |= RV3D_CLIPPING;
03214     rv3d->clipbb = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoundBox), "clipbb");
03215 
03216     /* note; otherwise opengl won't work */
03217     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
03218 
03219     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
03220     view3d_get_transformation(vc.ar, vc.rv3d, NULL, &mats); /* NULL because we don't want it in object space */
03221     ED_view3d_calc_clipping(rv3d->clipbb, rv3d->clip, &mats, &rect);
03222 
03223     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03224 }
03225 
03226 static int view3d_clipping_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03227 {
03228     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
03229     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03230 
03231     if (rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING) {
03232         rv3d->rflag &= ~RV3D_CLIPPING;
03233         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
03234         if (rv3d->clipbb) MEM_freeN(rv3d->clipbb);
03235         rv3d->clipbb = NULL;
03236         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03237     }
03238     else {
03239         return WM_border_select_invoke(C, op, event);
03240     }
03241 }

03269 
03270 /* ***************** 3d cursor cursor op ******************* */
03271 
03272 /* mx my in region coords */
03273 static int set_3dcursor_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
03274 {
03275     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03276     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03277     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
03278     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
03279     float dx, dy, fz, *fp = NULL, dvec[3], oldcurs[3];
03280     int mval[2];
03281 //  short ctrl= 0; // XXX
03282     int flip;
03283     fp = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
03284 
03285 //  if (obedit && ctrl) lr_click= 1;
03286     copy_v3_v3(oldcurs, fp);
03287 
03288     project_int_noclip(ar, fp, mval);
03289     flip = initgrabz(rv3d, fp[0], fp[1], fp[2]);
03290     
03291     /* reset the depth based on the view offset */
03292     if (flip) {
03293         negate_v3_v3(fp, rv3d->ofs);
03294 
03295         /* re initialize */
03296         project_int_noclip(ar, fp, mval);
03297         flip = initgrabz(rv3d, fp[0], fp[1], fp[2]);
03298         (void)flip;
03299     }
03300 
03301     if (mval[0] != IS_CLIPPED) {
03302         short depth_used = 0;
03303 
03304         if (U.uiflag & USER_ORBIT_ZBUF) { /* maybe this should be accessed some other way */
03305             view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
03306             if (ED_view3d_autodist(scene, ar, v3d, event->mval, fp))
03307                 depth_used = 1;
03308         }
03309 
03310         if (depth_used == 0) {
03311             float mval_f[2];
03312             VECSUB2D(mval_f, mval, event->mval);
03313             ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, dvec);
03314             sub_v3_v3(fp, dvec);
03315         }
03316     }
03317     else {
03318 
03319         dx = ((float)(event->mval[0] - (ar->winx / 2))) * rv3d->zfac / (ar->winx / 2);
03320         dy = ((float)(event->mval[1] - (ar->winy / 2))) * rv3d->zfac / (ar->winy / 2);
03321 
03322         fz = rv3d->persmat[0][3] * fp[0] + rv3d->persmat[1][3] * fp[1] + rv3d->persmat[2][3] * fp[2] + rv3d->persmat[3][3];
03323         fz = fz / rv3d->zfac;
03324 
03325         fp[0] = (rv3d->persinv[0][0] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][0] * dy + rv3d->persinv[2][0] * fz) - rv3d->ofs[0];
03326         fp[1] = (rv3d->persinv[0][1] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][1] * dy + rv3d->persinv[2][1] * fz) - rv3d->ofs[1];
03327         fp[2] = (rv3d->persinv[0][2] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][2] * dy + rv3d->persinv[2][2] * fz) - rv3d->ofs[2];
03328     }
03329 
03330     if (v3d && v3d->localvd)
03331         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
03332     else
03333         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | NA_EDITED, scene);
03334 
03335     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03336 }
03337

03340

03343     ot->description = "Set the location of the 3D cursor";
03344     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_cursor3d";
03345 
03346     /* api callbacks */

03348

03350

03352 //  ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
03353

03355 
03356 }
03357 
03358 /* ***************** manipulator op ******************* */
03359 
03360 
03361 static int manipulator_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03362 {
03363     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
03364 
03365     if (!(v3d->twflag & V3D_USE_MANIPULATOR)) return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
03366     if (!(v3d->twflag & V3D_DRAW_MANIPULATOR)) return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
03367 
03368     /* only no modifier or shift */
03369     if (event->keymodifier != 0 && event->keymodifier != KM_SHIFT) return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
03370 
03371     /* note; otherwise opengl won't work */
03372     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
03373 
03374     if (0 == BIF_do_manipulator(C, event, op))
03375         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
03376 
03377     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03378 }
03379 
03380 void VIEW3D_OT_manipulator(wmOperatorType *ot)
03381 {
03382 
03383     /* identifiers */
03384     ot->name = "3D Manipulator";
03385     ot->description = "Manipulate selected item by axis";
03386     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_manipulator";
03387 
03388     /* api callbacks */
03389     ot->invoke = manipulator_invoke;
03390 
03391     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
03392 
03393     /* properties to pass to transform */
03394     Transform_Properties(ot, P_CONSTRAINT);
03395 }
03396 
03397 static int enable_manipulator_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
03398 {
03399     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
03400 
03401     v3d->twtype = 0;
03402     
03403     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "translate"))
03404         v3d->twtype |= V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE;
03405     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "rotate"))
03406         v3d->twtype |= V3D_MANIP_ROTATE;
03407     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "scale"))
03408         v3d->twtype |= V3D_MANIP_SCALE;
03409         
03410     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
03411 
03412     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03413 }
03414 
03415 void VIEW3D_OT_enable_manipulator(wmOperatorType *ot)
03416 {
03417     PropertyRNA *prop;
03418 
03419     /* identifiers */
03420     ot->name = "Enable 3D Manipulator";
03421     ot->description = "Enable the transform manipulator for use";
03422     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_enable_manipulator";
03423     
03424     /* api callbacks */
03425     ot->invoke = enable_manipulator_invoke;
03426     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
03427     
03428     /* rna later */
03429     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "translate", 0, "Translate", "Enable the translate manipulator");
03430     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
03431     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "rotate", 0, "Rotate", "Enable the rotate manipulator");
03432     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
03433     prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "scale", 0, "Scale", "Enable the scale manipulator");
03434     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
03435 }
03436 
03437 /* ************************* below the line! *********************** */
03438 
03439 
03440 static float view_autodist_depth_margin(ARegion *ar, const int mval[2], int margin)
03441 {
03442     ViewDepths depth_temp = {0};
03443     rcti rect;
03444     float depth_close;
03445 
03446     if (margin == 0) {
03447         /* Get Z Depths, needed for perspective, nice for ortho */
03448         rect.xmin = mval[0];
03449         rect.ymin = mval[1];
03450         rect.xmax = mval[0] + 1;
03451         rect.ymax = mval[1] + 1;
03452     }
03453     else {
03454         rect.xmax = mval[0] + margin;
03455         rect.ymax = mval[1] + margin;
03456 
03457         rect.xmin = mval[0] - margin;
03458         rect.ymin = mval[1] - margin;
03459     }
03460 
03461     view3d_update_depths_rect(ar, &depth_temp, &rect);
03462     depth_close = view3d_depth_near(&depth_temp);
03463     if (depth_temp.depths) MEM_freeN(depth_temp.depths);
03464     return depth_close;
03465 }
03466 
03467 /* XXX todo Zooms in on a border drawn by the user */
03468 int ED_view3d_autodist(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, const int mval[2], float mouse_worldloc[3])
03469 {
03470     bglMats mats; /* ZBuffer depth vars */
03471     float depth_close = FLT_MAX;
03472     double cent[2],  p[3];
03473 
03474     /* Get Z Depths, needed for perspective, nice for ortho */
03475     bgl_get_mats(&mats);
03476     draw_depth(scene, ar, v3d, NULL);
03477 
03478     depth_close = view_autodist_depth_margin(ar, mval, 4);
03479 
03480     if (depth_close == FLT_MAX)
03481         return 0;
03482 
03483     cent[0] = (double)mval[0];
03484     cent[1] = (double)mval[1];
03485 
03486     if (!gluUnProject(cent[0], cent[1], depth_close,
03487                       mats.modelview, mats.projection, (GLint *)mats.viewport, &p[0], &p[1], &p[2]))
03488     {
03489         return 0;
03490     }
03491 
03492     mouse_worldloc[0] = (float)p[0];
03493     mouse_worldloc[1] = (float)p[1];
03494     mouse_worldloc[2] = (float)p[2];
03495     return 1;
03496 }
03497 
03498 int ED_view3d_autodist_init(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, int mode) //, float *autodist )
03499 {
03500     /* Get Z Depths, needed for perspective, nice for ortho */
03501     switch (mode) {
03502         case 0:
03503             draw_depth(scene, ar, v3d, NULL);
03504             break;
03505         case 1:
03506             draw_depth_gpencil(scene, ar, v3d);
03507             break;
03508     }
03509 
03510     return 1;
03511 }
03512 
03513 // no 4x4 sampling, run view_autodist_init first
03514 int ED_view3d_autodist_simple(ARegion *ar, const int mval[2], float mouse_worldloc[3],
03515                               int margin, float *force_depth) //, float *autodist )
03516 {
03517     bglMats mats; /* ZBuffer depth vars, could cache? */
03518     float depth;
03519     double cent[2],  p[3];
03520 
03521     /* Get Z Depths, needed for perspective, nice for ortho */
03522     if (force_depth)
03523         depth = *force_depth;
03524     else
03525         depth = view_autodist_depth_margin(ar, mval, margin);
03526 
03527     if (depth == FLT_MAX)
03528         return 0;
03529 
03530     cent[0] = (double)mval[0];
03531     cent[1] = (double)mval[1];
03532 
03533     bgl_get_mats(&mats);
03534 
03535     if (!gluUnProject(cent[0], cent[1], depth,
03536                       mats.modelview, mats.projection, (GLint *)mats.viewport, &p[0], &p[1], &p[2]))
03537     {
03538         return 0;
03539     }
03540 
03541     mouse_worldloc[0] = (float)p[0];
03542     mouse_worldloc[1] = (float)p[1];
03543     mouse_worldloc[2] = (float)p[2];
03544     return 1;
03545 }
03546 
03547 int ED_view3d_autodist_depth(struct ARegion *ar, const int mval[2], int margin, float *depth)
03548 {
03549     *depth = view_autodist_depth_margin(ar, mval, margin);
03550 
03551     return (*depth == FLT_MAX) ? 0 : 1;
03552 }
03553 
03554 static int depth_segment_cb(int x, int y, void *userData)
03555 {
03556     struct { struct ARegion *ar; int margin; float depth; } *data = userData;
03557     int mval[2];
03558     float depth;
03559 
03560     mval[0] = x;
03561     mval[1] = y;
03562 
03563     depth = view_autodist_depth_margin(data->ar, mval, data->margin);
03564 
03565     if (depth != FLT_MAX) {
03566         data->depth = depth;
03567         return 0;
03568     }
03569     else {
03570         return 1;
03571     }
03572 }
03573 
03574 int ED_view3d_autodist_depth_seg(struct ARegion *ar, const int mval_sta[2], const int mval_end[2],
03575                                  int margin, float *depth)
03576 {
03577     struct { struct ARegion *ar; int margin; float depth; } data = {NULL};
03578     int p1[2];
03579     int p2[2];
03580 
03581     data.ar = ar;
03582     data.margin = margin;
03583     data.depth = FLT_MAX;
03584 
03585     copy_v2_v2_int(p1, mval_sta);
03586     copy_v2_v2_int(p2, mval_end);
03587 
03588     plot_line_v2v2i(p1, p2, depth_segment_cb, &data);
03589 
03590     *depth = data.depth;
03591 
03592     return (*depth == FLT_MAX) ? 0 : 1;
03593 }
03594 
03601 void ED_view3d_from_m4(float mat[][4], float ofs[3], float quat[4], float *dist)
03602 {
03603     /* Offset */
03604     if (ofs)
03605         negate_v3_v3(ofs, mat[3]);
03606 
03607     /* Quat */
03608     if (quat) {
03609         float imat[4][4];
03610         invert_m4_m4(imat, mat);
03611         mat4_to_quat(quat, imat);
03612     }
03613 
03614     if (dist) {
03615         float nmat[3][3];
03616         float vec[3];
03617 
03618         vec[0] = 0.0f;
03619         vec[1] = 0.0f;
03620         vec[2] = -(*dist);
03621 
03622         copy_m3_m4(nmat, mat);
03623         normalize_m3(nmat);
03624 
03625         mul_m3_v3(nmat, vec);
03626         sub_v3_v3(ofs, vec);
03627     }
03628 }
03629 
03630 void ED_view3d_to_m4(float mat[][4], const float ofs[3], const float quat[4], const float dist)
03631 {
03632     float iviewquat[4] = {-quat[0], quat[1], quat[2], quat[3]};
03633     float dvec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, dist};
03634 
03635     quat_to_mat4(mat, iviewquat);
03636     mul_mat3_m4_v3(mat, dvec);
03637     sub_v3_v3v3(mat[3], dvec, ofs);
03638 }
03639 
03640 
03641 /* object -> view */
03642 void ED_view3d_from_object(Object *ob, float ofs[3], float quat[4], float *dist, float *lens)
03643 {
03644     ED_view3d_from_m4(ob->obmat, ofs, quat, dist);
03645 
03646     if (lens) {
03647         CameraParams params;
03648 
03649         camera_params_init(&params);
03650         camera_params_from_object(&params, ob);
03651         *lens = params.lens;
03652     }
03653 }
03654 
03655 /* view -> object */
03656 void ED_view3d_to_object(Object *ob, const float ofs[3], const float quat[4], const float dist)
03657 {
03658     float mat[4][4];
03659     ED_view3d_to_m4(mat, ofs, quat, dist);
03660     object_apply_mat4(ob, mat, TRUE, TRUE);
03661 }
03662 
03663 BGpic *ED_view3D_background_image_new(View3D *v3d)
03664 {
03665     BGpic *bgpic = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BGpic), "Background Image");
03666 
03667     bgpic->size = 5.0;
03668     bgpic->blend = 0.5;
03669     bgpic->iuser.fie_ima = 2;
03670     bgpic->iuser.ok = 1;
03671     bgpic->view = 0; /* 0 for all */
03672     bgpic->flag |= V3D_BGPIC_EXPANDED;
03673 
03674     BLI_addtail(&v3d->bgpicbase, bgpic);
03675 
03676     return bgpic;
03677 }
03678 
03679 void ED_view3D_background_image_remove(View3D *v3d, BGpic *bgpic)
03680 {
03681     BLI_remlink(&v3d->bgpicbase, bgpic);
03682 
03683     MEM_freeN(bgpic);
03684 }
03685 
03686 void ED_view3D_background_image_clear(View3D *v3d)
03687 {
03688     BGpic *bgpic = v3d->bgpicbase.first;
03689 
03690     while (bgpic) {
03691         BGpic *next_bgpic = bgpic->next;
03692 
03693         ED_view3D_background_image_remove(v3d, bgpic);
03694 
03695         bgpic = next_bgpic;
03696     }
03697 }
